title: Eventbrite - Discover popular events & nearby fun
description:
Discover upcoming events near you and get personalized recommendations. Stay up on the latest for popular events like concerts, festivals, yoga classes, holiday events on New Year’s Eve or Halloween and networking events. Find something fun to hit up by date, time and location. Buy tix and keep ‘em handy on your mobile device to make check-in nice and easy. Ready to explore?

With the Eventbrite app you can:

• Find what’s new and hot nearby at a wide variety of venues
• Stay in the know on what’s going on today, this week, this weekend, whenever
• Get personalized event recos for whatever you’re into
• Share events with your crew and vice versa
• Add upcoming events to your calendar
• Buy tickets and check out easily on your mobile phone
• Store your credit or debit cards for fast, secure checkout
• View event details so you can get there on time and own it
• Check-in with the app, ditch old school paper tix 

What does Eventbrite do?

There’s an amazing, fun, interesting world of events going on anywhere at anytime, we help you discover the best.

You can find things to do based on what you’re into, where you want to go or when you want to go out. 

We’ll also personalize recommendations based on where you’ve been and what you like.

Let’s get out there and explore.

This app is also available in German, Spanish, French, Italian, Dutch, Portuguese, and Swedish.

summary: Find upcoming events and local things to do, buy tix and check-in on mobile.
recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements
comments: The user interface is just fine. Pretty standard for something like this. Nothing special and nothing bad. HOWEVER!!! As soon as I sign up, I start getting telemarketer calls. I went from having 1 or 2 a week to 10 a day. They will sell your info even if you uncheck the boxes to not share. Those boxes only keep Eventbrite from filling your email with garbage. Keep this in mind when buying from them or making a profile.

Love this app! It's helped me discover so many more events in London - the "free stuff only" is great too! However, they really need to add more filters such as price and distance ranges, see events on a map, sort by what's closest to you etc. as some searches come back with thousands of results! Still highly recommend this app though :)

This app is great for finding events, but one point I would like to address, is that since events occur in cities, there is no need for the grainy location to be provided, such as when searching, adding Amman will provide different results from the location it chose for me, which is Balqa, which they are close to each other. So just giving a broader way of searching could be better and provide better results, as I found some difficulties browsing events.

"Meh." I've been using Eventbrite for over a decade ... The app? User experience is oversimplified, to the point of uselessness. You cannot "follow" a performer or venue, you can't even search for a venue or town, even if THEY ARE LISTED in events. Waste.

I can't log into the app to see my ticket purchase, all it does is send me emails (7 to be exact) to change my password and nothing happens when I do change it. I had to reach out to the promoter of the event just to make sure I can use the email I received to verify my ticket purchase.

title: Eventbrite Organizer
description:
Eventbrite Organizer (formerly Entry Manager) is the one-stop shop for event management on your Android device. Event planners can now create and edit events, monitor real-time ticket sales, check-in attendees, track attendance live, and quickly accept, secure payment for tickets and merchandise on-site. Get more details below or visit: https://www.eventbrite.com/l/Organizer-check-in-app/

With Eventbrite Organizer app event management is a snap. You can:
* Create events directly in your mobile app.
* Edit key event details (like your event description, ticket types and quantity and more) on-the-go — perfect for the busy event planner lifestyle.
* Take control of your ticket sales with access to real-time data.
* Easily edit your event listing from anywhere.
* Rely on easy-to-use ticket scanning and check-in to give guests a flawless entry experience.
* Keep your finger on the pulse of your event with live attendance tracking.
* Quickly accept secure payment for tickets and merchandise on-site and never miss a chance to sell.


Key Event Management Features:
* Edit from Anywhere: Make updates to your tickets or event listing seamlessly from your mobile device (which automatically syncs with the Eventbrite database) so you can stay in control of your event listing, no matter where you are.
* Check-in That Works: Reliably and efficiently check-in attendees by scanning tickets with the camera on your mobile device. Or, simply look up your guest’s name directly with a quick search of your guest list. Say goodbye to check-in headaches with our easy-to-use entry manager technology.
* Mobile Box Office: Accept all major credit cards, track cash transactions, print tickets and receipts on the spot, and send mobile and print-at-home tickets. Take your box office to the next level with easy-to-use accessories like our card reader and ticket printer.
* Solve Customer Requests Fast: Quickly look up orders, and reissue, cancel, or refund orders on the spot. 
* Real-Time Data: All sales and check-in data is synced with Eventbrite’s servers, so you can use multiple devices at different entry points without missing orders or duplicating tickets. 
* Multi-lingual? No problem: Organizer is also available in German, French, Italian, Dutch, Portuguese, Swedish, and Spanish. Olè!

Thanks for all the great feedback – we can’t get enough! Keep it coming at mobilefeedback@eventbrite.com. And if you’re loving the app, drop us a rating (and don’t be afraid to gush).

What is Eventbrite?
Eventbrite is the world’s largest self-service ticketing and registration platform, hosting a vibrant collection of live experiences to fuel people’s passions and enrich their lives.

comments: I amended my event dates from 7 March to 20 June but app is not allowing anyone to purchase tickets today 9 March. No help line number for me to contact Also the tickets that have been sold - funds have not been credited to my account

My events are tagged in a completely different town across the state and I've received no support on this. there is no option to add a YouTube video link on recurring events, and the search is very inconsistent with the tag usage as well. the banners are limited to a certain size and there are limits to how you can create and manage tickets on recurring events.
App is awful, you can't easily see the names of who bought a ticket and export them. Somewhat useless.
The Android app doesn't allow credit card payments in CAD, but the iOS version does. Fix this please.
It makes it so much easier to collect event admissions. Great platform.

title: All Events in City - Discover Events On The GO
description:
Discover upcoming local events and outdoor activities in your city & nearby places and get interesting event recommendations. You can find events your friends are attending and follow them to stay updated on their activities. Every day find some new things to do near you be it a comedy show, free art classes, business conference or a live music concert.

You can also get tickets for various holiday events happening near you be it Halloween party, New Year’s Eve or Christmas celebration. Buy Tickets easily as we have integrated PayPal, PayU and also pay at the venue system for our organizers who organize interesting events to make your lives happening.
With All Events in City app in your mobile, you have the world’s best event guide in your hands

✓ Search from a pool of experiences from any city; Be it Events in Toronto or New York or London or Mumbai or any nearby getaways. Present in more than 30,000 cities in the world, you can discover just about anything new to do around you. If you are new to a city for a vacation or for business and wonder what to do in that city, simply search for that city. Few of the top cities from where we get thousands of events everyday are Mumbai, Delhi, New York, Chicago, San Francisco, Kolkata, Chennai, Rome, London, Cairo, Bangalore, Cape Town, Toronto, Sydney, Edmonton, Los Angeles, Melbourne, Singapore, Dublin, Johannesburg and many other.

✓ No more boring weekends. Get updates via email every week for top things to do in your city and other outdoor activities happening near you.

✓ This free Event Finder app also lets you share events, map them on google, add them to your google calendar, follow friends, meet new people, make new friends, upload event photos and much more.

✓ Register for free events whether local or global and get tickets right in your mail. Share it with your friends on Facebook with just the click of a button right from the app. Other sharing options like WhatsApp, Twitter sharing or email event information.

✓ Find mutual connections who are attending a new event every week and message them through the app to join you during the weekend or any other day during the week.

✓ The different types of categories we have for you are as below:

- Parties – From House Parties to Club Nights
- Music Concerts – Be it rock, jazz, blues or metal, we have it all.
- Workshops – Art Workshop, Cooking classes, DIY workshop, Yoga Classes.
- Business – Networking, Trade Shows, Startup Seminars, Exhibition, Industry meetup.
- Dance – Contemporary Dance, Hip Hop Face-Off and much more.
- A few more categories to explore are theater plays, sports activities, travel and foodies’ meetup, health and wellness, comedy, etc.

✓ provides you with your own event calendar. Also a perfect event reminder as it reminds you about the upcoming events through notifications. Keep a track of events you have attended, attending and invited.

✓ See the list of trending events and experiences worldwide or in your city. Major of the organizers that use our featured listing are from top cities of the world like New York, Las Vegas, London, Singapore, Toronto, Melbourne, Mumbai, New Delhi, Bangalore, Chicago, Johannesburg, Dubai, Manchester, Rome, Brisbane, Brussels and few other.

✓ This is also a great app for people in event management as they can connect to event organizers for business and volunteering. Sponsors always keep a tap on our app to find out the gatherings of people that can give their product great visibility. Event organizers can also check their attendees and pictures that were uploaded live during the event.
So what are you waiting for? Come join hundreds of thousands of happy people who get high on events every day. It is your perfect guide to sail through the week and plan your weekend. Download “All Events in City” and never miss any event in your city.

comments: This was a great app, but in the last month it says " don't miss this" I click on it and it says please wait until I've waited 5 minutes and give up. I've deleted it and reinstalled it to no avail! Please help!

While trying to create a account only two options provided Either we can sign up with our facebook account?? (or) We can sign up with google account?? There should be a manual option to sign up something creepy, why you guys need our social signals to create a account in your database why not manually filling? Once provided the next prompt will be accessing of our friends list, once accessing the friends list dam you will make ads and encouraging to sign up more 😉 if I am not wrong 😊 😜

Not very well thought out. If you search on today's events, esp. on Saturday morning, you'll see loads of nightlife that finished in the early hours of the morning. That's no use to someone who wants to see what to do TODAY. It's a huge waste of time filtering out those past events.
Hint on the events happening around. One thing though, organizer seems unresponsive to queries. Wonder if the button works correctly?
Exceptional, great at keeping up with current affairs as a local resident

title: The Event App by EventsAIR
description:
The Event App by EventsAIR is your all-in-one single point of access for engaging and connecting with all aspects of the meetings and events you are attending. Simply install the app and enter your Event App code provided to you by your event organizer. 

With this app, you can:

•	Network with other attendees with the EventStream Private Social Network, including posting of photos, videos, likes and tags
•	Earn points, badges and prizes simply by participating in different activities at the event!
•	View a list of attendees, speakers, sponsors and exhibitors, and connect with them with direct in-app messaging
•	View a complete agenda of the event program and build your own personal agenda. You can also take notes at sessions and export them for future reference!
•	Participate in live polls, session surveys, purchase function tickets and even invite other attendees to sit at your table at evening events!
•	Stay up-to-date with real time messaging, alerts and news updates
•	Connect with other attendees with the easy-to-use contact exchange feature
•	Much more!

If you are an event planner and want to learn more about the powerful EventsAIR platform that includes this attendee app at no additional cost, please visit https://eventsair.com to learn more and request a personalized demonstration of this exciting platform!

comments: Wow, Just wow. Rarely have I seen such a bad; slow, unintuitive app. It's mind boggling slow in simple screens. It's unintuitive, you have to star speakers instead of tracks you want to follow. Even the app name is bad on you home screen. This is atrocious, made by utter amateurs with no idea about good UX design or app development, every bad practice has been done. 0 stars if possible.

Absolutely unusable - I wish the Conference organisers had done their homework and NOT gone with this app as unable to access content and when contacting customer support there seems to be no help available - sent around in circles and nothing gained - only lots of time lost!!!

The app was helpful at the event, however once the event is over it will not let you access the notes. Very disappointed and upset to lose all my notes! They should notify you that you must export the notes before the end of the event by email or notification. I would give it more stars, but since I would have been much better off not using it, it gets 1 star. I have reached out to the developer. If they can recover my notes, I will update my rating.
I'm not sure why this app isn't higher rated. I thought it was very useful tool for the conference I attended. Could be a little better structured, but simple enough.

App keeps freezing, getting a message that it is not responding. There seems to be a bug on the section where one can access the attendees' list - after one alphabet letter has been scrolled, it constantly jumps back to surnames starting with "de", then it freezes and gives the error message. Very frustrating.

title: Event Manager - AllEvents.in
description:
Tracking an event was never this easy. All Events Organizer app is built for the organizers who wants to grow their event reach and manage it easily. Our valued event organizers are now using it to keep a record of every attendee and manage ticketing for each just at the touch of a screen.
	
All Events Organizer App lets you manage your different organizer profiles, track total event page visits, no. of attendees, ticket sold and revenue generated. Event Analytics was never this easy. Drive more traffic to an event with Promotional Plans right from the App. What more? We have the hassle free ‘Pay at Venue’ option for our organizers.

Key Features:
✓ A dashboard for each event that shows the performance graph of an event with total views, no. of attendees, revenue and sold tickets over a period of time.
✓ View all the users who bought your ticket and their payment status.
✓ Keep a record for each and every attendee that shows at the event. Search by ticket id or scan via QR code that is sent to the attendees when they register.
✓ Generate Leads for your upcoming event with the help of our Organizer App which lets you differentiate between an impression and a lead who might be interested in your event.
✓ Manage Check-ins during the event to differentiate between those who actually attended an event and those who couldn’t make it to your event.
✓ View your event details right from the All Events Organizer App to verify if all the details about the event is correctly shown.
✓ Manage different organizer profile you have created for different types of events. You can also share each one of them with your contacts on various platforms.
✓ Promote an event at the touch of a button with our various promotional plans to increase visibility and track the results of that promoted event from the event insights.
✓ Manage all the Event Ticketing and Management solutions like verifying ticket, check-in, Pay at Venue, mail/call a user in case of payment not done, etc.

comments: Lovely app, simple to use, customer support is very prompt! And most importantly great visibility of the event online.
I loooove this app for managing my events! The only thing its missing is a way to keep track of our receipts and expenses better! Hint hint lol 😉
The best app in which I can manage everything related to sold tickets,manage my event and total revenue of my event. Amazing work guys keep me updated👍
Really really helpful to reach out a large audience.
It is very good application to create Event & for their promotion. Please make your QR code readable with google lens rest all thing is very good.

title: Meetup: Find events near you
description:
Get connected with local groups and events so you can meet new people and try new things. Use Meetup to explore your city, build your career, find support, get out of your comfort zone, or pursue a passion. Download the app to discover events hosted by local groups, or start a group to schedule your own events.

Discover local events and groups
- Get matched with events based on your interests, from book clubs to free yoga and more
- Explore groups and events by category, search by keyword, or see what’s popular in your area
- Save events you’re interested in and revisit them later
- Use discussions and messaging to stay in touch with the people you meet
- Easily switch between locations to find great experiences no matter where you are

Start a group
- Host your own events by creating a group for whatever you’re into
- Watch your community grow as your group is recommended to interested people
- Easily personalize and schedule events on-the-fly, and manage your group from anywhere
- Keep the momentum going between events by sharing photos and using discussions and messaging to connect with the people in your group

Get in touch with questions or suggestions: androiddev@meetup.com

In order to recommend Meetup events that are close to you and show your distance from a scheduled event, we use your device's precise location (GPS and network-based).

summary: Meet new people, do new things
recentChanges:
We’re always making improvements so Meetup works better for you. Get the latest version for all of the available features.

As always, we love hearing your feedback: androiddev@meetup.com
comments: The app seems okay, it's just the entire concept of Meetup seems to be dying in the areas I frequent. I've been on Meetup since 2013 and the group selection is nowhere near as good as it used to be. I know that's not really Meetup's fault but it's still indicative of a decline in popularity. I doubt I'll keep it installed much longer.

What's happened to Explore? Distance filter gone, so you can't specify range of 5,10,25,40 km anymore? Order by Date gone, so it defaults to Order by Recommended, and you can't see events ordered by time through the day, gone? Those 2 features weren't optimal before (couldn't be saved, and had to be set each time) but now they're just gone? Is this a bad joke? It's the equivalent of replacing Windows 7 with Windows 8. Why?

Meetup is great heaps of knowledge and help within stranger interaction on different topics within the community. I find the app good as it gives detail on the Meetup, messages and questions from people attending the Meetup and a rating after you attend the meetup letting other people on quality of the meetup. One thing that is a bugger on this app is applying your interests to your profile. For the meetups which are of interest to be emailed. Otherwise i have to search manually.

Although I am having trouble with some of the settings and navigating and finding out what email address I have .(the platform is somewhat difficult to manage on my android.) ... the intent is fantastic and it's helped bring together so many great people with like-minded needs and those who might have trouble meeting up out socially..

Buggy, unreliable, misses the point. The comment system in the events is amateurish to be kind, easily breaking a conversation. The application keeps on trying to clutter your main view with all meetup on your zone. Let's be clear about one thing I KNOW what I LIKE. I will search accordingly, mind your own business. It is the Facebook of the meeting applications, you do not wabt to use it, but all your frirbds are there.

title: Whova - Event & Conference App
description:
Whova is an award-winning event and conference app. It helps you gain insights about people you meet at events. Whova is one of the most widely used mobile apps by professionals for networking at conferences, trade shows, expos, summits, conventions, business meetings, corporate events, association events, and community gatherings. Whova, the Mobile Event App, has received the Event Technology Awards in 2016, 2017, and 2018, for three years in a row.

Watch this PREVIEW VIDEO to see how Whova can help you: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9IKTYK8ZS9g&t=25s

What makes Whova special? Whova's technology builds comprehensive profiles of attendees so you can view all attendee profiles before you even arrive at the event or conference. Plan in advance whom to meet at an event, what to talk about with each attendee, and reach out to others via in-app messages before, during, and after the event. You can also create casual meetups and arrange social activities with other groups of attendees. Whova revolutionizes event networking and significantly improves the ROI of attending events.

You can also use the Whova conference app to digitize and manage business cards you receive at events. Whova exceeds other business card reader apps by automatically building full profiles using Whova's SmartProfile technology.  This allows you to gain deep insights into your contacts' professional backgrounds, work experience, passions, and interests. You can also seamlessly connect with contacts online via LinkedIn and other platforms. 

Get more out of events:

- Never miss important updates: Get instant notifications from event organizers

- Browse comprehensive professional profiles of all event attendees

- Use the Community Board to self-organize social activities and gatherings, coordinate rideshares, break the ice, explore job opportunities, post questions and lost & found items, etc.

- Scan and save business cards and gain deep insights into your contacts

- Send in-app messages and schedule private meetings before and after events

- Access the agenda, GPS guidance, interactive floor maps, parking directions, slides, and photos

- Get involved in event activities through live polling, event gamification, Tweeting, photo sharing, group chatting, and mobile surveys

- Conveniently explore exhibitors' information and get coupons/giveaways with one tap

Get in touch:

To partner with Whova or simply to stay up-to-date with the latest news, please visit our website and follow us on Twitter:

https://whova.com
http://twitter.com/whovasupport
http://facebook.com/WhovaApp

We would love to hear your feedback! Contact us at support@whova.com

recentChanges: Provide new ways to collect more attendee feedback from survey, live poll and sessions rate.
comments: Great app. Conference attendees were able to send messages to each other, using this app, share photos, suggest topics for discussion, suggest great local places and events to attend, ask the conference coordinator questions, and a host of other features. We had fun using this app. I would recommend Whova conference app to any organization hosting a conference.

This is an awesome app! I've used other apps for tracking agendas and sessions and viewing attendees, but this is probably the most engaging one I've used. I love being able to see attendees AND find meaningful ways to engage before the conference even starts. This has definitely made me more excited for the conference I will be attending soon.

This app was wonderful in navigating my schedule through our recent NCCA event. My agenda had up to date information about break out training, number of attendees, and even last minute room changes. It was useful to network with the attendees on the app itself; asking and answering questions, swapping contact info, engaging in group discussion, etc. I enjoyed being able to complete the in-app session evaluation as well! Suggestion: allow presenters to add handouts/materials to follow in app

Great Conference Network Mechanism! Used this app during my conference last week! Loved the ability to network before, during and after the conference with everyone registered! It was fun! It was easy! It was competitive too! Collecting points to be in the Top 10 ranking! Hope Crawford will use this app for all future conferences!

At first I was annoyed at the thought of yet another app! However, after installing it I found it to be easy to use and indeed valuable to me as an attendee. I was able to chat and meetup with many people I wouldn't have found otherwise. Also, I loved the agenda feature. Before leaving Podfest 2020, I sent an email to the organizers of another event I'm scheduled to attend in May and recommended that they consider Whova in their planning. Gloria D.

title: Event Portal for Eventbrite
description:
Access your unique event app via the Event Portal for Eventbrite. Simply enter your unique event code and tap Go!

Features of your event app:
• Personalise your schedule, take notes and bookmark favourites
• Access event program, speakers, exhibitors and other essential information
• Stay informed with event updates
• Explore location and find your way
• Plus (when included) networking features, live polling and Q&A for sessions

About the technology:
Eventbrite’s onsite experience suite helps event organisers impress attendees every step of the way. 

Powered by Entegy.

www.entegy.com.au/eventbrite

not working well... slow, updating content with every opening, logout for no reason. very disappointing for an event app.
Won't connect to Internet. Fix or take off apps list!
needed this for a concert as my printer was down. app won't open says "no internet" but I have data AND am conected to my wifi at home. JUNK APP thanka for nothing

title: Facebook Local
description:
Welcome to Facebook Local! We’ve updated our events app to help you discover places and things to do recommended by friends you know and trust.

Keep up with what’s happening locally—wherever you are—whether you’re looking for something to do with friends this weekend or want to explore a new neighborhood.

Features:

* See the most recent activity, events and places your friends are interacting with and updates from event hosts and Pages you follow.
* Find events and activities happening near you on an interactive map and filter by time, category, location and more.
* Get recommendations based on what's popular with your friends, things you've been to in the past, Pages you like and our curated Guides.
* Choose to add calendars from your phone to see all of your plans in one place.
* Opt-in to get notifications about your upcoming events so you know if details change.

What's New:

* Ability to search for events, places and activities nearby or in another city or neighborhood.
* Browse timely Guides to find events, places and things to do by category.
* See event invitations you haven’t responded to at the top of your calendar.
* Explore Local Lists of recommended events and places in more than 60 cities.

comments: The concept of the app is great! I would give it 5 stars, but there's one major flaw. When I select a date to view events, it still shows me events from other days, including events from the day before where it's physically impossible to even go to! If I wanted to look at events for other days, I would select those dates! Common sense. It just gets very annoying.

I used to love this app, but the redesign made it clunky and useless. I don't use it anymore. The calendar view is gone and the map is always visible/in the background. Less available space for information, which means you need to scroll around a lot. Hard to search for specific events, the results aren't often correct. You can no longer view event discussions and the app sends you back to Facebook, which defeats the point of this app. I am just using the web event page instead now.

I try to search events in my town, the app shows events in a city 500 kilometers away from me, even though there are tons of events where I am. I thought it would be more useful than Facebook's events tab which is also really really bad, but this app turned out to be the worst. Facebook is just the definition of how to be the most user unfriendly platform ever.

It has a lot of bugs in it. Half the time you can't see all the information, especially if they put a link in the description. Sometimes it will lead you to the facebook website instead of interfacing inside the app. Currently it's not pulling any events. No way to sync events with your calendar either.

You can see & plan your regular FB events. Perfect. That's all I want from FB, I dont really use or care about the other events in my "Local" area. But please rename this app.I've complained for years there's no standalone events app. I frankly dont check FB often&miss things a the time. Nothing about the name or logo indicates you can check your regular events. I assumed it was just more bloatware. I learned this WAS the events app after reading a headline when looking for a third party app.

comments: I felt really bad about this,the odash is not working properly, I have tried for more than 15 times...it stops working after entering the endtime,try to rectify it I was at the end to thether...I didn't uninstalled it because I'm expecting rectification.

title: Galax Event - Create & find Events
description:
So many people today are alone and isolated - our vision is to make it easier for them to socialize and find their way out of their loneliness.

For this we have created Galax Event.
With this app you can find events in its vicinity, but also create events and invite them, be it birthdays, parties with friends or public events.

Filters allow users to find events according to their interests and location.

Now you come into play as organizer.
Completely free of charge and with no effort, you can create your events on Galax Event and make them visible to all.
Unlike current event apps, Galax Event has the advantage that it is a social network.
This makes the app more attractive and guarantees you greater reach.

So we offer you a platform where you can advertise your event. You can also get in contact with your target group, start actions and use the space for reservations, vouchers etc.
At the same time you support us in developing the potential of this app.

Again, you can:

- organize and post Ideas, projects and things like:

Birthday, celebration, party, holiday, leisure, wedding, engagement and game night.

- make your organized event visible.

- find nearby events, follow your friends, communicate and be social.

- discover theaters, museums, sights and flea markets. 

- Participate in sports activities and find friends with the same interests.

- become active and live as you please.

- filter your event by:

Party, Festival, Concert, Musical, Show, Music, Sports, Eating, Conference, Seminar, Art, Education, Family, Shopping, Culture, History, Community, Religion, Food, Drink, Restaurant



In the future you can use the app to:

buy tickets
sell ​​tickets
add events to the calendar
get suggestions about events
make your event more visible
find discounts
evaluate organizer


This event app is available in three languages:

German, English, Spanish.

title: StubHub - Live Event Tickets
description:
StubHub is the top destination for buying and selling tickets to the world's best events. Ticket prices may be higher or lower than face value.

MLB, NBA, NHL, and concert tickets at your favorite venue and more – StubHub has your tickets for amazing experiences! Over 10 million upcoming live sports events, concerts, theater shows, gigs and tours are available. 

StubHub recently ranked #1 in Newsweek’s America’s Best Customer Service in 2019. Tickets orders are 100% guaranteed, with customer service all the way to your seat. Get a coupon worth 120% of your original order if an event is cancelled.

Get tickets for your favorite MLB, NBA, NHL team, theater show or music concert from the day they go on sale to the day of the event. See the venue and find out which artists are performing from your phone.

Buy event tickets using the largest ticket selection with StubHub! Concerts, MLB, NBA, NHL tickets, local shows and more.

Sell tickets easily right from the StubHub app if you have a change of plans. 
STUBHUB FEATURES

• Event Recommendations: Let the fun find you with event recommendations based on your Spotify account, downloaded music, and favorite artists and teams
• Friends: Find out what your friends are into and which events they’re going to
• Interactive venue maps: See the view before you buy on selected maps
• Virtual venue View: Get an immersive, 3-D view from your section for selected venues
• Google Pay: Speed through checkout with Google Pay (US events only)
• Mobile tickets: Get in with your phone – no need to print!*
• Wear OS by Google: View your tickets, find events and more, just by looking at your wrist
• Venue and artist info: Check on upcoming events and discover similar artists
• Ticket price alerts: Tell us what you want to pay and get notified when there’s a match
• My tickets: Track your orders, view your mobile tickets and get ready for your next event
• Sell tickets: List tickets, manage your listings and view your sales
• Event categories: View events by category to discover events based on your interests or mood. Concerts, NBA games, comedy shows and more.
• Barcode scanning: Attract more buyers and keep tickets you're selling listed for longer by scanning ticket barcodes*

Buy and resell tickets for local events with StubHub. Download now!

*Available for selected teams and venues

• Sell tickets: List tickets, manage your listings and view your sales
• Event categories: View events by category to discover events based on your interests or mood. Concerts, NBA games, comedy shows and more.
• Barcode scanning: Attract more buyers and keep tickets you're selling listed for longer by scanning ticket barcodes*

Buy and resell tickets for local events with StubHub. Download now!

*Available for selected teams and venues
summary: Buy tickets for any concert, like Elton John's farewell tour, at the best price!
recentChanges: We hope you’re enjoying the StubHub app! In this update, we’ve fixed a few things to make the app faster and easier to use.
comments: Bad experience leads to a poor rating and negative comments. I purchased tickets to a off Broadway play in NY a week prior. The tickets weren't available for download 'til a before the play. With StubHub's guarantee I trusted that I would be good to and I could go ahead and plan the rest of my trip. Did I forget to mention that my wife and I flew in from TX. After a flight, checking into our hotel, and around 10 pm the day before the play, we still had no tickets. Horrible experience for sure.

The app works fine, I even sold tickets that I purchased by accident to someone else through stubhub, I am not going to be buying anymore tickets though because the fees are ridiculous. I paid double because of my mistake but the fees are just not worth it... so expect the fees when purchasing tickets.... I've been using them for years but in finally fed up with paying so much...

I found it difficult to find my tickets. I didn't know where to find them. Was not aware that the tickets were sent to Ticketmaster. It was very confusing..finally found them and needed the help of MSG to get them on my phone. I feel there should be better instruction when you make the purchase.

Its important to make sure the email address is correct before you buy tickets, i screwed up and my tickets went to a deactivated acct.but StubHub made it right and we made it to the show...it was fantastic
Great service! Tickets always delivered in time for game! Information and updates sent in timely fashion. StubHub is the best for tickets

title: Socio Event App
description:
With the goal of taking your event experiences to the next level, Socio is your go-to app at events, serving as a networking tool and digital event guide.

Through its Shake & Connect technology, Socio gets rid of the hassle of exchanging contact information. Just link your email, phone number, and social media accounts to a single profile and connect with others by simply shaking your phone! Magic!

In addition, with Socio serving as a digital event guide, you can access all of the information surrounding the events you attend, like attendee lists, agenda, and sponsors. With just a few clicks, you will stay in the loop with every update and change.

recentChanges:
* Single Sign-On login option is now available.
* Based on feedback from our clients the Title and Company fields have been separated and are now optional.
* Attendee social accounts has been redesigned and address, Slack Community, and WeChat ID are all now available options.

comments: Doesn't work. Trying to find my event. It does nothing when I try to search for the event.
Won't load or refresh. Has never got past landing pad even after uninstalling and reinstalling, restarting device and throttling other applications.
Switched from iPhone to android. Completely broken on Android. Constantly restarts and can't check messages or anything.

This is a good app - IF IT WORKS ON YOUR PHONE. Don't know how but it does not work on some phones that almost everything else runs on. Their alternative is to use a web site but that is cookie based instead of log in based and looses some of the major features.  Response to Socio's response: I am not running version 9.  Socio sent me a screen shot from something indicating that mine was one of Samsung's phones it would not work on.  Somehow other companies develop software that works on almost everything. The web based backup plan would have worked if they used a sign in system and if they integrated the same features in it.   It is supposed to be a 2 way communication with the event.  If you use the web version, you cannot communicate to the event at all.  This IS NOT an issue because of Android 9!  The phone I have is running an older version of Android that seems to support all software that doesn't need new specialty features.  Socio KNOWS that whatever they are using to create the software does not support some "normal" phones because they sent me a screen shot that listed various Samsung phone models that  could run the program and those that failed.

Installed, signed up with google.  It freezes and then crashes every time I open it.  Simply awful!  Cleared cache (as suggested) and it still freezes on opening for quite a while, but seems to _eventually_ work now.  I don't know how anybody who doesn't really know their way around the phone could get it to work.  Will update the review as new issues arise

title: Event Planner - Guests, To-do, Budget Management
description:
Event Planner - Guests, To-do, Budget Management is a simple, fast & compact utility that helps you to manage any event, wedding or party easily. 

This event planner helps to manage event / party by managing tasks, guests list, budgets and vendors of that event / party.

Event Planner - Guests, To-do, Budget Management app features:
* Manages To-do tasks List - Add, edit, search, and sort task lists. You can add subtask lists also. Check task lists as it completes. You can view summary report of number of pending and completed tasks and subtasks. You can also generate PDF of all tasks or individual task. You can share PDF report with your family or friends. 

* Manages Guests List - You can add, edit, search, and sort guests. You can also add companions of guest. Check invitation sent as guest invitation is sent. You can view summary report of number of guest invitation sent and not sent. You can also generate PDF of guests list. You can share this guests PDF report with your family or friends.

* Manages Budgets List - You can add and edit budgets with payments for different types of categories like accessories, flower & decoration and many more. Check payments as your payment is paid. You can view summary of number of payments and amount are paid and pending. You can also generate PDF of budget list. You can share this budget list PDF report with your family or friends.

* Manages Vendors List - You can add and edit vendors with contact detail and payments for different types of categories like jewelry, Music & show and many more. Check payments as your payment is paid to vendor. You can view summary of number of payments and amount are paid and pending. You can also generate PDF of vendor payment list. You can share this vendor payment list PDF report with your family or friends.

* Event Dashboard displays summary of Tasks, Guests Invitations, Budget payments, Vendor payments
* You can add, edit and delete your other event categories.
* You can take Backup of event data into your local device and then restore it.

Event Planner - Guests, To-do, Budget Management App will help you to make the event or party preparation easier than ever!

title: Events High - Meet Your City!
description:
Find out things to do over the weekend when you are bored and where the parties are - try out new experiences with your friends ! Available only in Bangalore, Delhi, Mumbai & Chennai. 

Who are you? What's going to make you smile? What's going to make you thrive? Who ever you're, you ever you're going to become, we've got an experience for you. Seize what city has to offer. Get ready for Events High.

In a mere seconds you can scan a world of things to do, see, taste, feel. Explore your self. Create some lasting bongs. Make new friends. Make a spectacular family memories. We have something for everybody.

Events High is a free app that brings to you all the events and things to do in a city at one place. Our team curates a list of interesting and unique activities happening at venues near you. So you can find, plan and book awesome things to do on weekends – NEVER BE BORED again! 

Don’t miss out on the awesome trekking experiences, great parties and comedy events happening in your city. Getaway from the boredom of the routine. This is a great app for those looking to try out different activities to engage, learn, network and have fun! Never get bored again!

We would like to hear how we can become better! Drop us a mail!
Keep in touch! Don’t forget to review the App on Google Play Store!

title: Event Assistant
description:
***NOTE: In order to fully use the app, you need to create an event at Events.com and be ready to check-in attendees to your event.***




The Event Assistant app by Events.com makes event check-in easy for organizers, volunteers and participants. This app provides tools to manage event day with participant look-up via voice recognition search or QR scanning, selfie verification, custom bib assignment, e-signature capture, offline mode and more. 

Organizers can view and collect as much or as little information from each participant as needed for smoother operations on event day. Devices auto-sync in real-time with other devices and with Events.com so that your data is always up-to-date.


Features include:
•	Participant look-up via voice recognition, typed searched or QR code scan
•	Data sync across all devices preventing duplicate check-ins 
•	On-site and cancelled registrations reflecting in real-time
•	Selfie-verification easily identifying participants during and after the event
•	Waiver e-signature capture eliminating paper waivers
•	Offline mode ensuring data is accessible despite strength of network connection
•	Scanning and validation eliminating duplicate attendee number assignment, such as bibs
•	Instant access to check-in stats for monitoring progress of event check-in

I used this app to check-in people to my networking event. I didn't have very strong WiFi, but the app continued to work just fine, no interruptions. I love how simple it was to use!

title: EventOrg-Event Management App for Corporate Events
description:
Empower your events and conferences with the best corporate event app. Develop and manage any type of event with EventOrg’s event solutions.

Whys Choose EventOrg as your Event Organizing App?

For Attendees : EventOrg enriches the event experience for attendees by giving the most relevant information at their fingertips and increases their engagement at the event.

For Event Planner : Create your Event planning App with minimal technical help and upload and share all relevant information of the event.

And what's more you can also customize the app according to your needs and get EventOrg’s free event app basic version for 7 days!

Here is the list of the main features of the Event app 

1. Digital Badge - You can easily control access to your event by generating QR code and scanning at the entry. This ensures faster check-in saving you time and money.

2. Program Agenda - EventOrg’s extensive Agenda gives attendees access to the latest event schedule. Bid farewell to the outdated, printed event schedules with EventOrg.

3. Social Wall - Allow your attendees to share live event photos.

4. Speakers – Check out the speaker’s profile and connect via Linkedin. 

5. Feedback  - Gather insights and feedback from your attendees instantly about the events.

6. News Feed - Get the latest event-related updates and announcements.

7. Materials - Share relevant presentations, videos and other event related content.

8. Participants -  See who else is at the event and connect with them through Chat. 

9.Tweet -  Allow attendees to tweet with event related hashtags.

10. Contact - Contact information for the event organizers and volunteers.

11. Chat - Connect with attendees and instrumental in enhancing the experience of attendees.

You can set up your event in the app in three simple steps upon signing up at our website ! 

For More details visit our website: http://www.eventorg.co/

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/EventOrgApp/

Follow us on Twitter:https://twitter.com/eventorgapp

Follow us on Instagram:https://www.instagram.com/eventorg_app/?hl=en

comments: A great app that helps the attendees to connect with each other and guide them though the event.

Kudos to the team for bringing up such a wonderful app. User experience is just so great. Covers a enormous amount of high quality events and every event displaying each bit of detail about it. EventOrg is an excellent app for event planning. It's equipped with useful features to meet all your requirements. The UI is simple and user friendly. You can easily collaborate with other event planners to seamlessly handle different occasions. I found it extremely useful.

title: Event Guide
description:
A companion app for attendees/members of conferences, conventions, and events that use to the Grenadine Event Planning System. Enter your conference code and use the app during your event.

 
Need Grenadine Events for your event? Point your browser to http://events.grenadine.co to find out how to subscribe and use this app for your own event.


Features:
- Browse up-to-date schedules, including descriptions, pictures, speakers and participants and other information.
- Works in offline mode. Don’t have data coverage in a foreign country while attending an event? No problem, download the app and event ahead of time and you’re good to go.
- Speakers and participants. Browse and search speakers, including names, pictures, titles and bios.
- Build your own schedule. Search for items of interest to you and add them to your own personalized schedule.
- Sign up for limited-space sessions. Sign up or get put on the waiting list for limited-space sessions right from your phone.
- Get the latest updates to items, speakers and schedules during the event (requires either data or wifi connection for updates).
- Important event information, contacts and resources about your event.


Additional information:

 
- For organizations, enter your own conference information and change the look and colors of the app to fit your branding strategy.
- Present your conference app in English or French
- Find out more at http://events.grenadine.co.


Grenadine Technologies Inc.

comments: It has amazingly convenient functions and good layout. But it's constantly crashing, but even worse, it keeps erasing my bookmarked events! It'll keep some here and there, but then next time I open it, or even switch between menus, suddenly My Events will be missing all but a few items! I've re-marked days worth of events 12 times now, I'll bet I'll have to do it 12 more by the time this event is over. I emailed them yesterday and got no reply. It's ruining my convention experience. :(

Very useful and well organized. I have used it for one event for a couple years now. Easy to sort out what I wanted to see versus random other ones. User friendly. A few issues experienced were "my schedule" items being removed randomly. Also locate only did the venue on google maps not within the venue.
Good app. Really organized and well thought out. Really informative. The only problem I had was the couple hours where it wouldn't show me the whole schedule for the day
Would be amazing if it worked right. Have had it erase my schedule 5 times already in this last event. No reason for it. I didnt refresh or sync. It just randomly does it.
Great for Ohayocon! All cons should use this. I just wish it had an optional alarm feature for event heads ups.

title: Nearify - Discover Events
description:
Discover all events you love, on topics you like, as never before, happening near you from more than 20 million events worldwide.

✓ Our users can discover awesome, new and amazing things to do, events in every city in India and outside India, such as trending events in Delhi, NCR, Gurgaon, Noida, Bangalore (Bangaluru), Mumbai, Pune, Chennai, Hyderabad, Kolkata as well as popular events in New York City (NYC), London, Boston, San Francisco, Las Vegas, Houston, Dallas, Singapore, Chicago, San Jose, Los Angeles, Atlanta, Austin, Miami etc including 200+ more happening cities of the world.

✓ Nearify recommends every day personalized list of events for you at the location of your choice. Also, find trending events for the weekend, weekdays or any major holidays in advance so that you can plan your free time ahead.

✓ Find what events your friends are liking, attending, when your favorite artists, musicians, comedians events are upcoming all at one place. 

✓ Never spend your free time getting bored sitting at home - be it a weekend or when you are on a vacation or travelling for work. For example, if you live in Bangalore and travel to Mumbai, Nearify is your friend to give you snapshot of places, things to do, Mumbai events as well as for your home town Bangalore events.

✓ Always know using, Nearify, what all is happening like College Festivals, Music Festivals, Dance Performances, Film Festivals, Rock and Roll, Karaoke, Food Festivals, Jazz Music, Indie Music, Country Music, Culture and Humanities, Sufi Theme, Theater, Magic Shows, Improvs and Stand-up Comedy, Bollywood,  Dance, Nature Walks, Live Bands, Dating, Blues Music, Open-mic, Mixology, Live DJ, Start-ups, Technology Product Launches, Adventure, Sports, Photography, Yoga Classes or any other interesting gig that you can attend, have fun when you step out of your homes, explore, and socialize.

✓ Use Nearify to invite your friends to your favorite events, share events with your groups on facebook, whatsapp, find directions to event venues, find events at your favorite venues, book tickets, cinema, movies. 

✓ You can even add your loved events to phone calendar to be reminded before the event that you should go and attend.

How to use Nearify
✓✓ After downloading, tell us the type of events you like from more than 2000 topics , your social profile (optional), and your location choice, and let Nearify do rest of the magic of finding the best ones for you.

✓✓ Take a glance of all these events, like them by clicking on the HEART icon or share it with your friends on any social platform.

✓✓ You can also follow your favorite artists and track their events.

✓✓ Well, that’s about it! Isn't it interesting!!

✓✓ Download now and never miss an event anymore

------------------
The story of how Nearify happened 

We were bored one weekend. Lot of time in hand but no clue about what to do. Despite scanning several websites we could not find anything interesting to do. No website was helpful in suggesting us events we could attend. In order to solve this problem and make discovering events easy, Nearify was born. 
-------------------------------------------
Now, sit back, download Nearify and enjoy events everyday.

-----------------for Event Organizers--------------
Nearify has a lot for the event organizers also - especially in Delhi, NCR, Gurgaon, Mumbai, Noida, Bangalore (Bangaluru), Mumbai, Bombay, Pune, Chennai, Hyderabad, Kolkata and other main urban regions in India. You can create your event on Nearify - Whether you are organizers of Fun events, whether paid or free, like parties, comedy shows, live music shows etc or you are organizer of business conferences, networking events or trade shows etc - you can in few clicks create your event and Nearify users will be able to see those events (Provided they are good events if not best). :) Let's Nearify the world by working together.
------------------


Also - Nearfy, Nearify Events, Nearby Events

The story of how Nearify happened

We were bored one weekend. Lot of time in hand but no clue about what to do. Despite scanning several websites we could not find anything interesting to do. No website was helpful in suggesting us events we could attend. In order to solve this problem and make discovering events easy, Nearify was born.
-------------------------------------------
Now, sit back, download Nearify and enjoy events everyday.

-----------------for Event Organizers--------------
Nearify has a lot for the event organizers also - especially in Delhi, NCR, Gurgaon, Mumbai, Noida, Bangalore (Bangaluru), Mumbai, Bombay, Pune, Chennai, Hyderabad, Kolkata and other main urban regions in India. You can create your event on Nearify - Whether you are organizers of Fun events, whether paid or free, like parties, comedy shows, live music shows etc or you are organizer of business conferences, networking events or trade shows etc - you can in few clicks create your event and Nearify users will be able to see those events (Provided they are good events if not best). :) Let's Nearify the world by working together.
------------------


Also - Nearfy, Nearify Events, Nearby Events
summary: Best city events, live shows, theater, concert, party, music, festivals, fashion
recentChanges: Fixed Google SignIn issue.
comments: So I proceed to download this app since I am in a town I dont know well, and I go through every option for 15 minutes and I select every single one which seems interesting, 61 topics I've selected by the way. And I am in a town of well over a million people. I eventually pick them all and it goes to a screen where it shows every event happening. The main menu, if you will. Anyway, it says there are no events... no events tomorrow, all week, or any other time either. It seems this app doesnt work

I tried this app once over the summer and found a free yoga class. Now every time I try to log in, it either can't connect to the Internet or "can't reach the Nearify servers." Huge disappointment, hoping it will get fixed soon.
App broken. Cannot connect to servers. No notifications from the company that the app is in development or shut down. No way of contacting them. Going to presume company pulled the plug & delete.
App not working. It keep saying error. A d nothing is loading. Is been like this for the past few weeks for me. Not sure exactly how long has been like that.

Could not onbaord. App would not consume my location. So i was stuck on the select your location screen. Eventually i cleared cache and went back through the flow with device locations on, allowed app permissions, tried manually enter a city and use device location. Neither seemed to get my location data delivered. So just stuck there. Samsung galaxy 8 OS 8.0. Seems like a good app idea. Id try again if you guys figure out what is going wrong getting location data.

title: Ticketmaster－Buy, Sell Tickets to Concerts, Sports
description:
Ticketmaster gives you access to millions of live event tickets and makes it easy to buy, sell, transfer, and get in - so you can get on with making memories that last.

We are the Official Ticketing Partner of the NFL, NBA, NHL, and USTA. Add in our exclusive partnerships with thousands of venues, artists, bands, theater tours, and broadway shows and shopping with Ticketmaster gives you unparalleled access to the most memorable live events worldwide.
 
Ticket management at your fingertips. You’re always just a few clicks away from securing the perfect seats to the live events and shows you love.
 
BUY SIMPLY
- Search millions of events and get real-time updates as new listings go live.
- Use interactive 3-D venue maps and see your seat view before you buy.

CHANGE OF PLANS?
- List your tickets on our trusted resale marketplace and sell to other fans.
- Transfer your seats to friends and family for free.
 
PROTECT YOURSELF FROM SCALPERS
- Avoid forgeries “similar location” seats with Verified Tickets. The seats you buy the seats you’ll sit in and backed by our 100% guarantee.

YOUR PHONE IS YOUR TICKET
- Scan into your events with the app or upload your seats to Apple Wallet (mobile-entry events only).
- See all your event info in one convenient place.
 
NEVER MISS OUT ON AN EVENT
- Get alerts about your favorite events, artists, bands, and venues.

Download the Ticketmaster app and go live.

REACH OUT TO US
Website: www.ticketmaster.com
Twitter: www.twitter.com/ticketmaster
Instagram: www.instagram.com/ticketmaster
Facebook: www.facebook.com/ticketmaster

summary: Buy and sell concert, broadway, theater, sports, NFL, MLB & last minute tickets.
recentChanges:
• Get through the purchase flow faster by scanning a credit card. Save time and remove the friction of manual credit card entry by scanning a credit card to purchase tickets to your favorite event.
• A new onboarding experience for a seamless introduction into the app!
• Every update of our app includes reliability and performance improvements
comments: Everytime I check events, favorites, notifications, and account the application completely crashes. This is heavily disappointing, because if I were to attend an event and the app crashes I won't be able to go inside the venue. What would be the purpose of having the app then? The application is meant to be accessible to users (who chose to use their phone as their ticket access), but it's pointless if the ticket is inaccessible to us online through the application.

The worst app ever. It logged me out and won't let me back in. I spent way to much money to not be able to see my ticket. I've had the ticket for a month and it decides to do this. Why are you not fixing it. People need their tickets that they paid you way to much money for. It's very nerve wracking not to know if the app will be working in time for my concert. Very poor customer service.

Up until the last update, this app worked okay. Now this last update has caused the app to freeze and shut down every time I try to access an option on the left side bar. Email support is not available to help, rendering this app virtually useless to see the status on postponed/canceled events that I have paid for.

Although I love the Ticketmaster App due to the ease of it, I am disappointed in the fact that we are not getting event updates through the app. I need to know if events are cancelled or rescheduled! I have numerous events that I have purchased tickets for months in advance and we are now coming up on those events without any notice! Your customers need to know and the app would be the best way to disseminate that information! Please add that into the app! We need to know!

Just bought tickets for a concert in a month. I havent been able to log into the app for weeks! Just shows a blank white screen. There is no way I am able to view my QR codes without the app unless I get them mailed to be for an extra fee- which is NOT happening. I have already emailed the customer service and they havent gotten back to me. Please fix the login issue. Time is ticking! (will fix the 1-star review when resoved)

title: Goldstar - Buy Tickets
description:
With Goldstar, you’ll discover tickets (often at a discount) to theater, Broadway, concerts, sports, comedy, nightlife, food fests and other events. We make it easy to fall in love with live entertainment again and again.

APP FEATURES: 

• New events are added daily. 
• Easy and secure checkout. 
• Exclusive discounts and complimentary tickets. 
• Earn rewards with each ticket purchase.
• Personalized event recommendations. 
• Star favorite events and venues to get alerts when tickets become available. 
• Get reviews, directions and helpful tips from fans who have already gone. 
• Event tickets for Live Nation/Ticketmaster, MLB, NBA, NFL, NHL, Major League Soccer, Ringling Bros. and Barnum & Bailey, Cirque du Soleil, Broadway, Disney On Ice and more. 

Never miss out on what's happening in: Atlanta, Baltimore, Boston, Chicago, Cincinnati, Dallas, Denver, Detroit, Houston, Inland Empire, Las Vegas, Los Angeles, Miami, Minneapolis-St. Paul, New York/New Jersey, Orange County, Philadelphia, Phoenix, Pittsburgh, Portland, Sacramento, San Diego, San Francisco/East Bay, San Jose, Seattle and Washington, D.C., and more!

HOW IT ALL WORKS: 

Unlike secondary market-focused ticket sellers like StubHub, SeatGeek, Vivid Seats, TicketIQ and Rukkus, Goldstar partners with event producers, venues, and artists to secure the best prices on live events for our members. We have ticket integrations with primary ticketers, including AXS, Eventbrite, and Ticketmaster, which makes it possible for us to deliver an event experience that’s on par with primary ticket sellers. You’ll also find our events deals on: Groupon, Living Social and Yelp.

PRESS: 

"The low ticket prices and plentiful consumer ratings of the shows are evidently creating a generation of live-entertainment junkies." -Reuters

"Goldstar offers a wide variety of entertainment." -New York Times

"...the scoop on cut-rate tickets to sporting events, concerts, comedy acts, museum exhibits, and more." -Consumer Reports

"Goldstar is a goldmine for theater & entertainment." -Star Tribune

CONNECT: 

Website - www.goldstar.com 
Facebook - www.facebook.com/goldstar 
Twitter - www.twitter.com/goldstar 
Instagram - www.instagram.com/goldstarevents
Contact Us - help@goldstar.com

comments: I love this app. There are lots of entertainment options at really great prices.

Goldstar is a great resource for me because I've been able to have more entertainment in my life. The ticket prices for the events are less expensive and using the app to purchase tickets is seamless. I enjoy your app very much.
Great entertainment. Affordable prices. It's the best!
Goldstar has given me affordable access to some wonderful arts experiences-- as a senior on a fixed income, this is a much appreciated benefit. I wish more events were linked to Goldstar!
Great discounts//great shows.and seating..i do recommend this app a plus..thank U

title: Salesforce Events
description:
The Salesforce Events app is the best way to stay connected to everything happening while you are onsite at any Salesforce event, including Dreamforce, World Tours, TrailheaDx, and Connections. Use the app to personalize your schedule, view sponsor profiles and stay connected throughout the event.

Some of the best ways to use the Events App:

•  Check Home for what is happening now and next at the event
•  Explore the overall session lineup using Schedule
•  Build your personalized schedule through Agenda Builder
•  See profiles and other details for event Sponsors
•  Get important schedules and other details in Info
•  Watch keynotes and other sessions via Salesforce Live

There's a lot going on at Salesforce events! We've worked hard to bring you an amazing events app to help you make the most of it, and it's 100% built on the Salesforce platform. Download the app and get started now to make this your best Salesforce event ever!

If you would like to be a beta tester for Salesforce apps, please follow this link for more information: https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.salesforce.dreamforce/join

recentChanges:
What's New in 8.0.0:

* Use your Trailblazer ID to log in! Use your existing Trailblazer credentials to log into the app.
* Bug fixes.
comments: Easy to use. Puts the information I need to get the most out of Dreamforce at my finger tips. Love the map feature. Would be great if I could mark a bookmarked session as 1st choice and other sessions at the same hour as alternates. Then to put the Cherry on top, let me toggle between all bookmarked sessions and 1st choice sessions.
Mostly great but the inability to filter out location is a huge issue when planning days. Also difficult to jump easily to a new time start in the list of all sessions.

Works well. Wish I could see a calendar view in the app without exporting it to my calendar. Also, next time I want to see the venue names on the map even if I havent bookmarked a session for orientation.
Should be able to filter sessions by site and confirmed enrollment sessions. And to store attended sessions. Game app was Glitchy at times. Did not register sessions attended

Very useful. Wish it were possible to specially tag particular sessions to prioritize above others. I bookmark all appealing sessions, but usually have a favorite in mind. App should let me track that.

title: Vivid Seats | Event Tickets
description:
Vivid Seats Tickets 🎫 is the leading mobile ticket app, helping tens of millions of fans buy and sell mobile concert tickets, Broadway and sports tickets to the MLB, NBA, NFL and more.  

Our 100% Buyer Guarantee means you can be confident that mobile tickets through the Vivid Seats Tickets app will get you into your favorite concerts, Broadway shows or sports event. In the Vivid Seats mobile app, resellers may list tickets above or below face value. 

WHY DOWNLOAD THE VIVID SEATS TICKET APP? 

💰REWARDS: With Vivid Seats Rewards, you can now earn credit back on your purchases simply by using the Vivid Seats app.  Download today and earn up to 8% credit back on tickets* 

🕰️ 🎟️ LAST MINUTE TICKETS: Need concert tickets, Broadway tickets, sports tickets or game tickets? Buy and sell mobile tickets for Broadway, concerts and sports through the Vivid Seats mobile ticket app. 

📱MOBILE TICKETS: Vivid Seats Tickets give you a platform to buy and sell mobile tickets (where venues accept them) easily. Forget printing your tickets -- just use the Vivid Seats app. 

👍APP-ONLY DEALS: We offer exclusive deals for concert tickets, Broadway tickets, sports tickets or game tickets through our mobile ticket app that you can't find anywhere else.  

*Terms and Conditions Apply 

FEATURES 

💺 FIND YOUR SEATS -- LITERALLY: Vivid Seats Ticket app includes interactive seat maps and the ability to see the view from your seat. You can use the Vivid Seats mobile ticket app to pick the right seat for you. 

👨‍🎤 USE SPOTIFY TO SEE YOUR FAVORITE ARTISTS LIVE: With the help of Spotify, Vivid Seats can determine your music preference and make concert suggestions so you'll be able to snag concert tickets for your favorite performer. 

🔍 EASY SEARCH: Our filters allow you to search by price, section, row, date. Whether you're looking for sports tickets or game tickets, broadway tickets or concert tickets, the Vivid Seats mobile ticket app will let you search for the right event and help you get the cheap tickets. 

💯 100% BUYER GUARANTEE: All tickets purchased through the Vivid Seats mobile ticket app are backed by our 100% Buyer Guarantee. 

🏟️ FIND NEARBY EVENTS: Hear yourself asking "Are there any concerts near me this weekend?" Vivid Seats Tickets has got you covered! Set your location in the Vivid Seats app and we'll tell you all the nearby events.  

Download Vivid Seats Tickets now and experience what separates it from Ticketmaster, StubHub, Gametime and SeatGeek! 

With Vivid Seats Tickets you can buy and sell sports, concert and theater tickets for: 

Los Angeles (Angels, Rams, Chargers, Lakers, Clippers, Kings, Anaheim Ducks, Galaxy, Hamilton and more) 
New York (Mets, Yankees, Jets, Giants, Knicks, Brooklyn Nets, Islanders, Rangers, New Jersey Devils, New York FC, Hamilton and more)

Toronto (Blue Jays, Raptors, Maple Leafs, Air Canada Centre) 
Phoenix (Arizona Diamondbacks, Arizona Cardinals, Phoenix Suns, Coyotes, Talking Stick Resort Arena) 
Boston (Red Sox, New England Patriots, Celtics, Bruins, Fenway Park, Gillette Stadium, TD Garden) 
Seattle (Mariners, Seahawks, Sounders, CenturyLink Field, Safeco Field) 
Festivals and Concerts (Lollapalooza, Coachella, Pink, Garth Brooks, Beyoncé, Elton John, Monster Jam, Taylor Swift and more!)

comments: Horrible! Customer service is horrendous. My first purchase of tickets: I was on the phone with their representative for the first 45 min of a concert because the virtual tickets were unable to scan. Before they finally sent me new tickets that were not corrupt. The second purchase: The date of my concert was postponed, and when I asked to exchange or refund my tickets they told me that was not possible, AND it is not possible for me to resell my tickets on their website or app.

Horrible! A giant pain to access tickets. High fees. On top of that, I can't download my ticket from the app. If the app is down, I'm screwed. Just want my f###ing tickets emailed or downloaded. Too much to ask after I paid a 30% fee for the service? Aparently so. Never again.

More verification steps than my bank and more sketchy-looking than a pirate NFL stream, but it's the only way I could get tickets ahead of the game. And why the hell can't I print my damn tickets? Oh yeah, cause they want to be on my phone. Uninstalling the minute I'm through the gate but they already got my data. All I can do is leave this review and go back to scalpers next time.

I was looking for tickets to a concert. When I started to fill out the info for the tickets when it came to the part for payment I put in the info of credit card and right away I get a notification from my back that there were 4 charges from vivid seats and I never hit ( place order ) button. Now I'm charged for tickets I never purchased

Only use this app of you're desperate, because the service fees are f'n ridiculously high! 2 tickets cost me an extra $103.44! I then paid $24.00 for event insurance, but that is on me. The price shown should include taxes and fees. Other wise your getting blindsided with extra cost!

title: @event
description:
What is @event?
@event is a Sport mobile platform that enables the user to register to sport events, order merchandise and pay. The platform was created in order to save you time and provide you accessibility to many businesses under one platform.
why downloading many applications when it is possible to use only one for everything?
The Israeli Triathlon Association and Israeli Swimming Association are using the platform as well as other sport event organisers, many sports brands and Triathlon Training Groups.

How does it work?
Simply select the relevant business based on specific category . Choose from a variety of menu items and add them to your cart. When you are done, click "checkout" and type in your credit card information for payment. Even better, create an @event account and securely store your credit card on file for easy one-click payment at checkout. Once you have paid, a message will prompt, telling you when your order will be delivered or when and where to pick up your order. It's that easy!
How long does it take to get my order delivered?
The answer depends on the business and the amount of orders that are currently being served business at each. You are prompted with the current delivery time on the confirmation of your order.

What is the alcohol policy?
You must be 21 years of age or older to order alcohol. Upon delivery or pick up of your order your must present your valid ID to receive your order.
Once I have submitted my order can I make any changes?
Unfortunately once an order is submitted, it cannot be changed. Please contact us if you need any help.
Is @event secure?
Yes. @event is using the latest technology of PCI Compliance and encrypted, we have the most stringent level of security to protect all of our users.
Credit card information will not be saved in the Mobile ONLY Token will be saved in order to protect you.
What if I never received my order?
In the off chance that you did not receive your order, please email us immediately at support@atevent.co.il with the following information, we will check and get back to you in a timely manner with an answer.
Your Name
Email
Date Charged
Amount Charged
Additional Comments
How can I contact @event Customer Support?
Just click on the contact us button at the bottom of this screen and you will be able to Call, Email, or Tweet us from there. Please don't hesitate to contact us with any needs you have before, during, or after your order.
@event team is always there for you!!
At event LTD

title: Event Guest list & Check-in
description:
Easy Check-In +Mobile Event App (Works offline)

Registration, Guest List & Easy Check-in Management, Multi-Session / CEU Entry Manager, On-Site Name Badge Printing, Selfie Badges, RFID Compatible, Accept Walk-ins, Collect Signatures and Guest Photos, Collect and Edit Custom Guest Information, Timeline of your Guests for Check-ins and Check-outs.

Boomset integrates with popular registration platforms. Import your guests from: 
- .XLSX
- Eventbrite 
- Bizzabo 
- Xing Events 
- etouches 
- and more!


Event planners and marketing professionals love that they can:
- Add walk-ins with ease
- Collect and receive donations
- Scan tickets & invitations
- Use RFID for attendee tracking
- Send custom notifications and comments to event staff/attendees
- Manage access control 
- Learn event numbers in real time and post-event data reporting
- Less paper, more sustainable event planning: Instantly print name tags as you check-in guests

Boomset’s event automation platform is designed to save time, simplify marketing efforts, and collect valuable data.

Boomset’s Event Guest List + Check-in App features include: 
- Search, check-in/check-out guests instantly 
- Print name badges on-demand
- Use Boomset in kiosk mode for custom-branded self check-in, selfies and signature collection
- Session scheduling, attendance tracking, and live attendee statistics 
- Pair with Boomset’s Lead Retrieval & Mobile CRM application for easy scanning
- Sync guest lists and data between all devices in real-time 
- Check in attendees even if your device goes offline (No WiFi or 3G/4G/5G connection required) 
- Collect money during the event via Authorize.Net and Stripe
- Track donors and the amount of donations collected individually by your staff members in real-time
- Receive notifications via text or email when designated guests check-in 

Disclaimer: Design elements vary based on hardware manufacturer.

The events don't appear on my list, despite being added. I have to search manually and use. After using, they still dont stay on the list. List is always empty. 3. I tried to contact via app and leave a message. Cannot attach files and there is error in sending message. I can't send an email too.

under rated app for sure. works 95% of the time and generally it's an internet issue rather than app. if it's the app a quick refresh and it's fine. useful that the same account can be used across different devices

title: Event Planner (Party Planning)
description:
Do you have to plan a wedding, a party or any other event? Event Planner (Party Planning) may help you keep everything under control. It allows you to easily manage the guest list with details like gender, age, invitations, RSVP and attending. 

Event Planner (Party Planning) features a set of tools to help you plan and organize your wedding, party or any other event: 
- guest list with invitations and RSVP
- todo list
- shopping list 
- budget planner. 

You can split bigger events like your wedding in smaller ones like bachelorette party, ceremony and reception.
You can easily switch between events and also copy guests list from one to another.

You will not forget to take care of anything by using the TODO list in order to manage your tasks. 

The shopping list and the budget tool will help you to keep under control the spendings for your wedding / party / event. 

With Event Planner (Party Planning) you can organize multiple events at the same time, from simple parties to more important events.

Tags: wedding, party, event, planner, guest list, todo list, shopping list, budget, tool,  rsvp
