title: Gametime - Tickets to Sports, Concerts, Theater
description:
Gametime is the app that helps *you* score last minute ticket deals to all your favorite events!  

Did you know ticket prices for your favorite events - sports, music, and theater - actually go down the closer you get to showtime?  Get the best deals, see the view from your seats, and utilize Gametime’s super-simple checkout process to get into events even after they have started. Mobile ticket delivery helps save paper and printing headaches. Easy mobile ticket sharing lets you send tickets to all your friends so they can join you in the fun.

SCORE GREAT DEALS
- Take advantage of falling ticket prices as you get closer to the event time. 
- Buy tickets up to 90-minutes after the start of the event.

EASY TICKET BUYING
- The best seats at the lowest prices = big savings!
- Utilize venue maps to make easy seat and price comparisons to find the exact seat you want.  
- Panoramic photos show the exact view from any section. 
- 2-Click checkout process.
- Mobile delivery allows you to buy and walk into the event without missing a step.  

NO HIDDEN FEES
- None of the added “printing fees” or “convenience fees” that other companies love to add onto their prices at checkout.  
- Pick your seats, see the full cost, and click to buy.  
- No add-on costs.  Ever.  

ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY
- Mobile ticket delivery saves paper & ink. 
- Send tickets to friends directly to their mobile phones, they don’t need to print anything either!

EASILY SELL TICKETS  
- List and price tickets with just a few taps. 
- If you have paper tickets (boo!) simply take a picture to have them listed to sell digitally.  
- Get text updates as soon as your tickets sell.
- Get paid through PayPal or in Gametime credit.

Gametime is THE ticket app for all major sporting events including top baseball, football, hockey, and basketball from all the top leagues (MLB, NFL, NBA, NHL, MLS, & NCAA).  Discover the top concerts from hit artists (Taylor Swift, Billie Eillish, Drake, Post Malone, Bruno Mars, Jonas Brothers, Mumford & Sons, Blink-182, and more!). Don’t miss out on top theater shows (Hamilton, The Book of Mormon, Les Misrables).  Also other events like Monster Jam, WWE, and hit comedy tours (such as Nick Offerman, Aziz Ansari, and Trevor Noah).  

We believe in shared experiences (bring your friends!) and the power and enjoyment of live entertainment.    

Shop, compare, and save with Gametime.

developerAddress: 799 Market St, San Francisco, CA 94103
recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: Able to get tickets last minute. Dev's have some issues to workout, however you will receive your tickets. I suggest having your tickets loaded before you get to the venue. I am a contractor for the three largest wireless carriers in the USA, towers near sporting and concert venues the day of an event are always overloaded. Do yourself a favor and load before you get to the venue, a screenshot will also work. Cheers!

The experience in buying tickets is very easy but over time the fee amount above the actual ticket price has raised significantly since first coming out and they do not indicate what it is for. It'll give you a price for each individual ticket and then once selected have a total for you to buy much above the ticket price and no where does it explain what the extra money is for before you pay for them. Also for concerts, if arena name is too long it doesn't show the city it is in within the space

Game time is the ticket app I use for my Orioles tickets, the prices are lower by far over every other app I've used and the interface is very attractive. The veiw of my seat is probably my favorite feature. It's very extensive so I can do all of my event searching in just one place. Thank you gametime and keep up the good work!

Took a long time and several attempts trying numerous log ins to finally get into the Game time ap. Made very nervous of my recent purchase and took time away from the many other things I was to do instead of fight with this. I just hope I get my tickets and will be able to get into game??? When I can view them I think I'm going to print them out if I can just to be on the safe side. Very inconvenient.

My favorite app to use for spring training games in Arizona. Fees are relatively high compared to other sites, however prices are almost always lower than StubHub, SeatGeek or others. Usually a lower all in price to purchase tickets. Selling tickets is also much easier because the app automatically sets the price to be competitive in the market. I have had very good success selling tickets. GREAT APP for last minute ticket transactions

title: Danceplace Events
description:
Explore your favourite dance events with the free Danceplace event app. Stay informed with real-time updates and announcements. See venues, artists and workshop schedules effortlessly. Create a personalized event agenda. Rate events, workshops and activities. Dance event organizers can stay connected with customers and hear their feedback. Give customers a reliable tool to find event information and plan their time effectively – right from their smartphone. 

Explore the world of dance:
✓ Discover upcoming dance events, all genres, worldwide
✓ Personalize your experience around your favourite dance genres 
✓ Save dance events to your calendar for easy viewing
✓ Get detailed information about the events, including venues, artists, workshops and activities
✓ Learn about event artists, DJs, and performers 

Make your event experience better:
✓ Rate, Favourite and Check-in at events, workshops, and activities you attend
✓ See each artist’s schedule
✓ View event schedules, with options to filter by room or day/night programs
✓ Create a custom agenda based on your favourite artists, workshops and activities 
✓ Get real-time updates and announcements from event organizers
✓ Browse event information online and view it offline while roaming – no need for continuous WiFi

title: Big Days - Events Countdown
descriptionHTML:
Stylish and lightweight app to remember and track your events in a simple and fast!

View the remaining days or days elapsed after an event. You can use it to remind you: appointments, anniversaries, birthdays, holidays, exams, events festivals... customize with your own photos or use the search feature that finds thousands of free images on Pixabay!
You can also create an alarm for each individual event. You can choose a favorite event to be displayed every time you open the app!

Features:
- Choose the event image, from: camera, gallery or search online on Pixabay;
- Creates a notification for each event;
- You can choose a favorite event for display at startup;
- Days remaining before an event;
- Days elapsed after an event;
- Double click on the countdown to change the color;
- Drag the countdown wherever you want;
- List of all events;
- Unlimited number of events!
- You can change the color of the app;
- Choose the font you prefer;
- Share an event on social networks or with your favorite applications, save, print, copy, use as background Wallpaper!

Follow us & share events:
#bigdaysapp
@bigdaysapp

Would you like to improve or translate the app into your language? Contact us from the app's Info menu, we have translated the app into many languages thanks to your support :)

For information or suggestions, please use the support form in the About menu of the application.
summary: Stylish app to remember and track your events in a simple and fast!
developerAddress:
Astrovic App (Sorbera V.)
Via G.Carducci 11
95030 Tremestieri Etneo, CT
Italia
recentChanges:
- Big Days is more social! Follow us on Instagram and Facebook and share your events! #bigdaysapp @bigdaysapp
- Finnish translation added! Special thanks to Niko for the support!
- Fixed bug that didn't allow to edit an event on Android 8.
- Do you want to improve or translate the app into your language? Contact us from the app's Info menu, we have translated the app into many languages thanks to your support :)

We wish you many Big Days! :)
comments: I love this app! Helps me to track my progress in relation to big events, and also gives me things to look forward to. Some of the features are not super intuitive, but also not too hard to figure out.

Great app for tracking important events in your life. It does what it says it will do...chose you dates and let the app track by counting days since something happened, or days until something happens. I highly recommend this app and use it often!
The app works pretty good but you get limited events for free. Occasionally earn free ones but it's unclear how. Otherwise good and pretty!

It's a great app, but you can only create 5 events. It says that you will eiter have to write a rewiev or upgrade to pro if you want more, but if you upgrade to pro you Will only get 5 additional event's

this is a wonderfull app no kidding. it really works. for men especially. they tend to forget important things. i'd have given it 10 stars. it really work good for important appointments and something else. it's a great app. good app wonderful app. You're great

title: EVENT MOON:  LOCAL EVENTS NEAR ME
description:
Explore upcoming local activities & Find events nearby with #1 event finder app

Bored? Don’t know what to do tonight? Want to create memories that last for a lifetime? Round up your friends and find tonight’s activity on Event Moon: Local Events Near Me – the ultimate event finder, calendar & event planner app.


SUPREME EVENT FINDER
Do something new, do something exciting and live life to the fullest with EventMoon.

No more constant searching for the “best events nearby”, no more long-term planning, and no more confusion on where to find the nearby fun. No matter where you are located, This event planner app has all the big local events in your area. It’s like your personal event calendar and event finder app that will take your social life to a whole new level of awesomeness.

EASY TO USE WITH 200K+ EVENTS
How can you find events and nearby activities? *TAP* … it’s that easy! Press one button and you’ll instantly see all the nearby events in your local area. Choose from over 200,000 events across the USA, Canada, Australia, and Thailand. Explore concerts, festivals, Dj events, parties, musician performances, and each event countdown.

GROUP CALENDAR, CHAT & PLANNER
Besides the fast and easy way to discover events, you may plan going to these events with your friends using the easy to use group event calendar and chat. Add your favorite events to the group calendar and stay connected with a group chat! Once you add an event to your list, their group calendar will also get updated and you can discuss/plan going to the event in a group chat.

EVENT MOON: LOCAL EVENTS NEAR ME APP REWARDS
EventMoon rewards just continue to get better with the more people that sign up; you can view the full rewards guide inside our event finder app or on our website at www.eventmoon.com. So besides having all the best upcoming events at the glimpse of your hand, you can also earn rewards. Start using EventMoon today!

CREATE EVENTS & PROMOTE YOURSELF
- Are you a musician or event planner? Do you want an easy and compelling way to announce and promote your event? You may use our event app to create events as well. Even more so because we offer one of the best event creation features!

Create events and promote yourself and your event to tap into millions of people looking for an event to go to. Our platform makes it easy to manage your event's details, RSVPs, ticket sales, and track event metrics.

Event Coundown
Would you like to follow a new event arranged by your favorite band near you? Follow the event to receive updates and keep an eye on the event countdown.

Before your event takes place, EventMooners can create a buzz by recommending your event to all of their friends – and afterward, attendees of the event can rate it on our app!

Use our platform and grow all your future event’s attendance by up to 50%! 5 minutes is all it takes to transform your event from just an idea into the next big weekend attraction. 

App Highlights
•	Simple and easy UI/UX
•	Clean and clutter-free app layout
•	Tap the search icon to discover new event near you
•	Take a break from the mainstream event follow-ups
•	Track the event countdown and stay informed
•	Get instant updates on new event activities
•	100% transparency, privacy, and security for users
•	Discover thousands of events from different countries

Experience incredible night outs, cultural events, music events, food events and much more!

Would you like to satiate your cravings for trying out new stuff? How about starting your eccentric journey by attending new events every day?

So no matter if you want to find events and local fun activities, or create and promote events, EventMoon: Local Events Near Me is your ideal choice.
Never miss out on another event - EventMoon has every event under the moon!

Download now to discover and plan to go to amazing events in your area!

This app is convenient and very smooth. I used it in Connecticut to find events but stopped for awhile when I moved to Cali. I started it back up and it's just as good here on the West Coast! I highly recommend it to anyone looking for something fun to do!

I regret having ever downloaded your app and registering my e-mail on it. Your constant forced e-mails are extremely annoying and i can't even unsubscribe because your mailing letters don't provide the "unsubscribe" feature at the bottom. PLEASE STOP SENDING ME E-MAILS!

once subscribed, this app floods your e-mail inbox with offers and newsletters, and the so called "unsubscribe" button doesn't even work... all it does is direct you to a dead link that says "unsubscribe news letter"... report this app!

Loving the direction and the variety of local events . Finding events while Traveling to different states is a breeze ! But the app needs some tweaks. But overall experience im looking forward to the updates

title: EVENTS MOBI
description:
Take your events experience to the next level. Get access to events calendar, speakers, venue and navigation, notifications, networking and much more in one app. Build your own agenda, find events happening around you and keep up with updates before, during and after the event.

Know your speakers, form personal agenda, establish connections with experts in industry and Make It Real... with EVENTS MOBI!

recentChanges: Update to dynamic link functionality
comments: Loved it on iOS, hate it on Android. No notifications and events are in military time so instead of 3pm like on iOS, my Android event says 1500. No reminders whatsoever on either device, even though there is an alert menu that allows you to choose when youd like to ve alerted. Ive used this app for a few years but its now time to find something new

Wasted a lot of time. Phone died and all info lost. Got new phone. Spent hours inputting data and paid premium so I wouldn't lose the info again. 3 months later it won't open. Uninstall and reinstall ineffective. Waste of money. Huge waste of time.

I bought this app, and discovered that many of the features don't work or are broken. For example, I entered two times that are an hour apart, but the main screen shows them being a day apart. Alarms don't work on Android. Events disappear from one of the display pages. Definitely using another app.

Good app which I like to use but I paid an annual subscription to use coloured icons. Got using them once before they disappeared again. Have contacted app a few times asking why they have disappeared after I paid to use them but got no response. Poor customer service.
Love that I can have as many countdowns as I need! Also love the little logos I can tag to each of my countdowns! Definitely adds to the excitement of upcoming events!

title: Event Tickets Plus
description:
Keep the line moving and your guests happy with Event Tickets Plus! Your attendees will love having the option of using either mobile or printed tickets, and the Event Tickets Plus App can handle both.

As you scan QR codes at the door, the event attendee list updates in real time on your site—this app works with our Event Tickets Plus ticketing system and allows you to quickly scan attendee tickets and record that information on the admin side of your WordPress site. Combine it with The Events Calendar plugin for a full events management solution!

recentChanges:
Vibration toggle confirmations added even in silent mode. You’ll feel when check-in scan occurs
Use your phone’s camera flash as a flash light with torch mode
Added error catching to log bugs you experience on your device and share with us.
When users scan a QR code more than once, we’ll wait until a 5-second timer tied to the QR code has expired before scanning again.
Your API key is saved when submitted.
Updated to latest supported SDK to support phones and operating systems + 64-bit support.
comments: I'm facing an issue with this app: tickets that have not already been checked in are almost immediately scanned a second time, and therefore the app displays that the user is already checked in. There is no 5 seconds delay in this case, unlike written in the description.
love the system, works well on my phone but the camera on my tablet does not want to focus when I'm in the app.. yet the camera works fine when I'm not using the app.
Really easy to connect this app to our website and working flawlessly to scan our attendees. Really fast.
Needs updates. feels abandoned
Awesome

In the app:
View Multiple Events – Access the different events you’re attending all from a single app

title: Mobile Event App
description:
The multi-event-application „MEA“ will take you directly to your event in just a few steps. Whether meetings, congresses or conferences: By code entry or QR-scan you will immediately get to your event and all corresponding information.

Use the Mobile Event App to view current items on the agenda at any time, to retrieve profiles of other participants, to be up-to-date by push notifications or to network with the organizer and other guests through in app communication. The dashboard allows you to quickly and intuitively switch between different features.


Are you planning an event?

With the universal solution of the Mobile Event App you can easily design your personal event app. Use the MEA in your individual corporate design and benefit from over 40 proven functions.

In addition, you have the opportunity to extend the app with optional features and thus perfectly adapt to your needs. Due to the possibility of a short-term implementation of your project, you can use your personalized event app within 3 working days.

Visit https://mobile-event-app.com. We will gladly inform you and prepare an offer geared to your needs.

title: Plan It Out - Event Planner
description:
Looking to invite guests to your awesome house party? Planning a family vacation? Holding a mini concert or Going out for a road trip with friends?

Worried about managing your guest list, various tasks to cross out, keeping track of your expenses, planning the itinerary, delicious meals to serve or sending event invites?

Don`t worry!

Introducing Plan It Out - Event Planner, an event management application offering you a plethora of features:

Event Details and Theme:
Mention all the important event details such as the dates, time duration, location, cost, description using interactive UI elements such as  date and time pickers and Google Maps or simply import from any of your previous events and make your event planning super fun and easy. Select a theme from an endless and ever growing themes picker to give your event a visual perception.

Mini invitation Cards:
Generate mini invites for your events providing the essential information as well Google Maps based location for ease of tracking based on the event theme and instantly share the mini cards with your friends, families or guests via your favourite sharing platforms such as facebook, twitter, whatsapp or simply email or message them.

Itinerary:
Easily plan the various activities across different days during your event by mentioning the activity date, times etc using easy to use date and time pickers and let us handle the rest, while you enjoy the event.

Guest List:
Manage your guest list at one place. Add new guests or import the ones on your contacts list along with their contact details. Keep count of the no. of guests invited, attending as well the ones who haven't  responded yet. Moreover, keep track of the amount received from your guests to calculate the return of investment (ROI) for your event.

Delicacies/Food Menu:
Mention all the delicious food items that you'll be serving segregated into different categories such as appetizers, snacks, drinks, main dishes, salads or desserts to keep your food menu as tempting as your event.

Todos/Tasks:
List down all the things that you need to shop or different tasks that you need to perform and keep crossing the ones that are completed on the go and stop worrying about missing something important to do.

Expenses Manager:
Keep track of the various expense incurred during the planning and execution phases specifying the estimated and actual costs for different items. Get a summary of the overall as well as individual estimated and actual costs incurred to keep track of profits or losses and manage your budget with ease.

What are you waiting for? Start Planning.

recentChanges: - Fixed app crashes
comments: Great app but i can't print or share anything for others helping in the planning. Unfortunately i have to uninstall. All the work I did and can't print. :(

i have set up a small group outing. but the app will not share?? it doesnt seem to connect contacts so that they are notified. most important for me. the saving is weird. i frequently lost itinerary items before saved due to not being able to scroll up to complete input in location.( keyboard blocked view) i had to save without a location and then go backvand edit. also location doesn't seem to actually connect to maps at all. so wouldn't help my guest to find places.
Would have been an amazing app but it kept crushing every time without warning or auto saving anything... even after reinstalling it thrice!!

I am enjoying the visual nature of the app and like the mini invite cards but would be so much better w RSVP option. Beyond that I love the duplicate info feature and hope this will help me stay organized. I host the same event weekly with different themes and people so the checklist is handy. my requests: -RSVP link from invite w plus 1, 2 opt. -share button auto populates - more/customizable images - opt out ads - mass message to those who RSVP yes
There is no auto save. If app is closed all is lost unless you manually save after each item. Bummer if easily distracted.

title: Evite: Free Online & Text Invitations
description:
Evite brings people together to celebrate your most important life moments, from kids’ birthdays to happy hours. We make coming together face-to-face effortless and even more memorable for you and your loved ones every day.

Throwing a party? Use the app to:

• Choose from thousands of new free and Premium digital invitations for occasions big and small, organized by event category and keyword search
• Create invitations in minutes: customize event title, time, location, and host message simply by tapping
• Personalize free design templates with photos from your camera roll, or fully customize Premium invitations and envelopes
• Send invitations via text message or email by choosing right from your phone contacts or Evite contacts
• Track RSVPs in real time (including confirmation of who has viewed your invitation)
• Send updates and reminders to everyone (or just those who haven’t responded)
• Invite more people, update your event settings, or control notifications at any time

Invited to a party? Use the app to:

• RSVP (including for your plus-ones!) after receiving your text or email notification
• View event details and stay up to date on the go – you’ll never miss a message
• Post comments, “like” posts, upload photos, and ask questions before, during, or after the event in the invitation’s private event feed
• Come back to relive memories of the event invitation at any time

Let’s make your next event a memorable one. Be There with Evite.

recentChanges: Add a personal video message or upload an existing video to Premium Invitations. Say hi, sing a song, do a dance – whatever you want!
comments: I cannot get to read the FAQs before I get in as they're behind another login screen, when I don't have a username for this, my email doesn't work as one. I don't want to get started with my invitations to find that they will cost me an astronomical amount to send or the guests have to download the app to respond, or there are hidden costs etc. so I will have wasted my time. Open the FAQs please.

Easy to navigate for the most part. Some features online from computer hard to find via app or not available in app. Also, it would be helpful if there was a way to set an RSVP end date. So, people can no longer RSVP after the date picked. After. My RSVP date if a yes person changed their RSVP to no evite allowed more RSVPs to come through. That's why only 4 stars. Other than that the experience was great. Easy to update guest list, upload photos, and send messages to my guests.

Happy for years. I use evite for all of my personal and social invitations. Super simple to use and you can send invites right away. I love that you can use email or text. Also, the survey function and ability to allow guests to sign up for potluck items are bonus features.

Just used evite for my son's birthday party. I was very happy with the ease of use. A few notes, some invited folks had trouble seeing the address on the invite, no way to open address quick way to open to Maps. Also, It would be nice if you didn't have to pay for another package if you ended up needing a couple more than the smallest package. I had to buy another 15 person package. You can copy and share the code, but it does not add them to your list unless they select RSVP.

The app is so-so. Some aspects are great but others a big miss, like the fact that the user interface is such that I cannot see the address to the event I am RSVP-ing for or that it's impossible to find the What To Bring list for an event in the app. Fix those and it would be an incredibly useful tool.

title: Add Quick Event - fast and easy calendar entry
description:
Do you have a nightmare using your calendar app to add a new event?
Takes too long? Crazy amount of options and clicks?

With Add Quick Event the pain is gone.
Arrange events using a single text field!
You can update calendar almost with no time.

No need to jump from one place to another setting many options.
Everything will be put in the right field while you type. Prepare new entry instantly! 

You can quickly add two custom reminders. Type "phone mum 19 r15 r30" to create reminder about calling mum at 19:00. You will be reminded twice: 15 and 30 minutes before the event (if both of them are set for minutes). Basically it changes reminders values of which you have in settings. It activates them even any of them is switched off. If a reminder is set for days, "2r" will set reminder 2 days before the event occurs.

Just use easy to memorise key words.
- Type ‘9 phone Mark’ to schedule ‘phone Mark’ today at 9:00.
- Pints this Friday? Enter: 'fr 18 pub'
- Do you have lunch with mom next Sunday? Simply type: '2su 13 lunch with mum'
- Enter ‘7.8 2w working from home’ to set event that on 7th of August you will start working from home for 2 weeks.

Key:
• numbers = type 8 to get 8:00 AM, 13 to get 1:00 PM or 1445 to get 2:45 PM
• numbers + pm or am = enter 8am to get 8:00 AM or 8pm to get 8:00 PM
• h = 1 hour later
• 2h = 2 hours later
• d = tomorrow
• 2d = the day after tomorrow
• [number]d = after [number] days (3d, 4d, 10d, etc)
• Replace h or d with w or m to set weeks or months same way
• mm/dd or mm/dd/yy = month/day (11/30) or month/day/year (7/15/2017)
• mo or tu/we/th/fr/sa/su = selects coming day of a week (mo = Monday, tu = Tuesday, etc)
• 2mo or [number]tu = selects next Monday or n-th Tuesday
• 45r = remind 45 minutes before (overrides default reminder)

Examples:
• 9 phone Mark  = phone Mark today at 9:00 AM
• 3h check emails = check emails after 3 hours (if the current time is 2:15 PM, the event will be set at 5:15 PM)
• Dan's birthday = Dan's birthday (today, all day event)
• w 17 meet Jane//office//new contract = meet Jane, office (location), new contract (description) the same day next week at 5:00 PM
• fr 18 drinks = drinks at 6:00 PM on this Friday
• 2su 13 lunch with mum = next Sunday lunch with mum at 1:00 PM
• 9/17 2w working from home = working from home since 9/17/2017 for 2 weeks
• 8/14 8/20 holiday = holiday from 8/14/17 to 8/20/2017
• 11/22 830 930 breakfast with boss = breakfast with boss on 11/22/2017 from 8:30 AM to 9:30 AM

Personalise your settings:
- Set regular duration of your meeting. You can also set ending of an appointment by typing: ‘15 16 meeting with Jane'.
- Set when you usually want to be reminded about an appointment. 
- You can also set custom reminder by typing: ‘20 45r phone Rich’. ‘45r’ = remind 45 minutes before, so you will be reminded about that phone call 45 minutes before 20:00. 

This app is more usable than voice control. No problem with background noise. Nobody can hear your meeting details. Scheduling is safe and reliable.

You can manage your diary easily creating entries just in a single text field. 

It easily analyses the text as you type and put into right fields instantly so you make sure that the appointment or meeting will be created properly. 

No need for jumping from one box to another, dealing with many confusing options. Organise your diary flawlessly.
descriptionHTML:
Do you have a nightmare using your calendar app to add a new event?
Takes too long? Crazy amount of options and clicks?

With Add Quick Event the pain is gone.
Arrange events using a single text field!
You can update calendar almost with no time.

No need to jump from one place to another setting many options.
Everything will be put in the right field while you type. Prepare new entry instantly!

You can quickly add two custom reminders. Type "phone mum 19 r15 r30" to create reminder about calling mum at 19:00. You will be reminded twice: 15 and 30 minutes before the event (if both of them are set for minutes). Basically it changes reminders values of which you have in settings. It activates them even any of them is switched off. If a reminder is set for days, "2r" will set reminder 2 days before the event occurs.

Just use easy to memorise key words.
- Type ‘9 phone Mark’ to schedule ‘phone Mark’ today at 9:00.
- Pints this Friday? Enter: 'fr 18 pub'
- Do you have lunch with mom next Sunday? Simply type: '2su 13 lunch with mum'
- Enter ‘7.8 2w working from home’ to set event that on 7th of August you will start working from home for 2 weeks.

Key:
• numbers = type 8 to get 8:00 AM, 13 to get 1:00 PM or 1445 to get 2:45 PM
• numbers + pm or am = enter 8am to get 8:00 AM or 8pm to get 8:00 PM
• h = 1 hour later
• 2h = 2 hours later
• d = tomorrow
• 2d = the day after tomorrow
• [number]d = after [number] days (3d, 4d, 10d, etc)
• Replace h or d with w or m to set weeks or months same way
• mm/dd or mm/dd/yy = month/day (11/30) or month/day/year (7/15/2017)
• mo or tu/we/th/fr/sa/su = selects coming day of a week (mo = Monday, tu = Tuesday, etc)
• 2mo or [number]tu = selects next Monday or n-th Tuesday
• 45r = remind 45 minutes before (overrides default reminder)

Examples:
• 9 phone Mark = phone Mark today at 9:00 AM
• 3h check emails = check emails after 3 hours (if the current time is 2:15 PM, the event will be set at 5:15 PM)
• Dan's birthday = Dan's birthday (today, all day event)
• w 17 meet Jane//office//new contract = meet Jane, office (location), new contract (description) the same day next week at 5:00 PM
• fr 18 drinks = drinks at 6:00 PM on this Friday
• 2su 13 lunch with mum = next Sunday lunch with mum at 1:00 PM
• 9/17 2w working from home = working from home since 9/17/2017 for 2 weeks
• 8/14 8/20 holiday = holiday from 8/14/17 to 8/20/2017
• 11/22 830 930 breakfast with boss = breakfast with boss on 11/22/2017 from 8:30 AM to 9:30 AM

Personalise your settings:
- Set regular duration of your meeting. You can also set ending of an appointment by typing: ‘15 16 meeting with Jane'.
- Set when you usually want to be reminded about an appointment.
- You can also set custom reminder by typing: ‘20 45r phone Rich’. ‘45r’ = remind 45 minutes before, so you will be reminded about that phone call 45 minutes before 20:00.

This app is more usable than voice control. No problem with background noise. Nobody can hear your meeting details. Scheduling is safe and reliable.

You can manage your diary easily creating entries just in a single text field.

It easily analyses the text as you type and put into right fields instantly so you make sure that the appointment or meeting will be created properly.

No need for jumping from one box to another, dealing with many confusing options. Organise your diary flawlessly.
summary: Add appointments to your calendar easily and quickly using a single text field.
developerAddress: 1817 EW, Alkmaar, Netherlands
recentChanges:
- Fixed bug affecting URL links (https:// and http://).
- Modify the keywords - go to settings and update them to meet your likening (use / to set different versions of a keyword).
- Escape keywords using \ or /, so "watch \5 films" will create just all day event (5 won't be recognised as an hour)
comments: Why didn't someone tell me about this app? It saves me so much time. Sure, it takes a bit of learning but if you're someone who enters a lot of events it is well worth it. I didn't find the ads too annoying but I paid for the ad-free version to reward the developer.
Amazing, easy to use and learn the codes for input
Awesome! This is a bit like programming your appointments
Works really well once you learn the shortcuts. Does what it says
not what I was looking for. it is like short-coding. I was looking for something I could copy/paste the event from my email and have the app figure out the time and date and address.

title: Event Tickets Center
description:
The Event Tickets Center app makes it easy to find premium and discounted tickets for the best shows, concerts, and sporting events nationwide! ETC has been selling tickets to special events for more than 10 years. We’ve provided tickets to more than one million happy customers all over the world. So, go ahead — get ready to make your next special memory! 



HUGE EVENT TICKET INVENTORY:
With tickets to thousands of events worldwide, Event Tickets Center is your hub for access to the excitement. Browse tickets today -- right from the ETC app!

- SPORTS: NFL, NBA, NHL, MLB, MLS, WWE, NASCAR, PGA, College Games & International Soccer
- CULTURE: Broadway, Off-Broadway, Musicals, Ballet, Theatre & Stand-Up Comedy Shows
- FAMILY ACTIVITIES: Ringling Brothers and Barnum & Bailey Circus, Cirque du Soleil, Disney on Ice & Monster Jam Trucks
- LIVE MUSIC: Country, Rock, Electronic, Alternative, Metal, Bluegrass, & Pop Concerts 
from bands like Metallica, Guns N' Roses, Radiohead, & Phish and artists like Adele, Beyoncé, Taylor Swift, & Justin Bieber!

EASY TO USE:
Shopping for entertainment and events with the Event Tickets Center app is easy! Our updated Android app lets you: 

+ Buy with confidence! Tickets have a 100% authenticity and delivery money-back guarantee
+ Search or browse by artist, team, category, venue or city 
+ Use local search to quickly find events in your area 
+ Review interactive venue maps that show your seating options 
+ Search by ticket, price, section and quantity
+ View from Section photos for many events 
+ Find last minute tickets with delivery in time for your event
+ Order on the app or call our expert customer service staff
+ Secure checkout using the latest industry-leading technology

HOW IT WORKS:
ETC is a premier ticket marketplace - we match you with the exact ticket you are looking for, so you get the best deal possible! Tickets are listed by thousands of fans and suppliers, who set the prices on the tickets they list. Prices may be above or below face value, so whether you're desperate for tickets to that sold-out show or looking for a cheap night out, you can find the deal that works for you!

Best of all, since all ticket sales are final, Event Tickets Center protects your purchase with a 100% guarantee so you'll never have to worry about scammers! Visit bit.ly/etc-guarantee for more info about our policy.

Event Tickets Center is a resale marketplace, not a venue. Prices may be above face value.

Visit us online
www.EventTicketsCenter.com
facebook.com/EventTicketsCenter
Twitter @EventTicketsCtr
Instagram @eventticketscenter

title: Event Reminder
description:
"Event Reminder" is a simple generic todo reminder app with a calendar where you can easily create reminder / alarm / todo of events planned by touching few buttons. It supports voice so you don't need to write event title. You can create "one time event" or "repeating events". While choosing repeating events, you can set frequency to repeat, for example, "every 2 days until 6 weeks" or "every weekends until 2 months" etc.

At home page you see a list of next set of due events with its priorities on the left to identify importance clearly. You swipe back to see expired and finished events. You swipe ahead to see next set of upcoming events. You can open calendar to see all your events for that month, depicted as status/priority color codes boxes. You can see events statistics with bar and pie graphs to monitor your progress effectively. You add event just by touching that day on calendar view or see list of events scheduled for that day.

You can control notification popups for reminder / alarm / todo based on event's priority. You can also enable / disable vibration and sound notifications as per your preference. You can finish or delete events individually or all at once in case of repeating events. You have even option to delete or finish single event in a series of repeating events.

Features : 
• You can Add, View, Edit and Delete event / reminder / todo
• You can set event / alarm priority - High, Medium or Low on a easy slider
• You can set alarm tone and duration in settings / preferences
• You can set notification - Popups, Alarm or Vibrate
• You can add notes to your event / reminder / todo
• You can set event category from the default list of categories or create your own category
• You can set repeating events by hourly, daily, weekly, monthly or yearly with frequency to repeat
• You can set days to repeat, for example - weekdays, weekends or selective days in a week
• You can even export your events as a file in your SD card to import later or share with anyone else
• A number of date formats to choose, as per your preference
• You can select time format AM/PM (12hr) or 24hr
• You can see your events and events summary, in a interactive calendar view, and add event directly from there
• All your Events in 5 type of event lists - 
        - Finished
        - Expired 
        - Today
        - Tomorrow 
        - Upcoming 
• You can sort event lists for easy navigation
        - Subject 
        - Date 
        - Priority
        - Category

title: Event Check-In App l zkipster
description:
Trusted by event professionals worldwide, zkipster helps the best invitation-only events happen. From custom online invitations and guest lists to fast, reliable, and secure guest check-in, zkipster is used regularly by global brands and organizations in more than 100 countries at galas, premieres, fundraisers, product launches, conferences, and corporate events.

- Sign up online and test features with a free event with 25 guests
- Customize guest lists with a range of pro event tools you can turn on or off for each event
- Build multiple guest lists, segment guests, launch campaigns with an easy-to-use email builder
- Create branded online email invitations with your own HTML design 
- Generate public or private response forms to collect guest information
- Monitor important guests using powerful analytics for RSVP and form submissions
- See your RSVP invitation lists automatically turn into dynamic guest lists with clear status updates
- Sync multiple devices, from all major platforms including iOS and Android
- Check in guests in less than 3 seconds
- Add and edit guest information on the fly
- Send and receive staff alerts via text or email
- Have us build dynamic seating charts to seat and reseat guests or build your own
- Select, match and source guest profile pictures within guest lists
- Print name tags and escort cards with a wireless printer at event check-in
- Monitor stats during and pull comprehensive event reports after your event
- Rely on the industry’s most reliable offline function in case your devices disconnect
- Receive customer support on chat, email or phone depending on subscription
- Subscribe for unlimited events or pay per event
 
Learn for yourself how seamlessly zkipster works. Join the industry leader today!

title: Campus Labs® Event Check-in
description:
Campus Labs® Event Check-in is a companion app for the Campus Labs® Engage student engagement web application that enables campus event hosts to easily and securely check students into events using mobile devices.
This app is for event hosts, students do not need to download this app to check-in at events.

With the Campus Labs® Event Check-in app, you can:
• deploy multiple attendance takers per event
• check students into campus events by scanning event passes
• add students to attendee list by search
• review attendees

title: Quick Event Logger: Log anything you like
description:
Easily make note of anything you want to keep a log/track of. Simply create an event for actions you want to track and tap a button to record a new instance of that event every time you do it again. Create any user-defined event you like, look at all past instances of a particular event, add optional notes or amounts to each event. Swipe to delete events.

Access your data from any of your Android devices, never lose your data and no need to back-up manually with full privacy and control over your data. Export event data as CSV file.

Powerful widgets help you quickly add events/instances from your phone’s home screen with a single tap.

Simple and lightweight app with minimum battery and data usage. Regularly updated and maintained to add new features, fix any bugs or crashes and make use of the latest libraries. ***** MORE FEATURES IN THE PIPELINE*****

Keep track of events like 
Car maintenance: Track how often you fill petrol/gas in your car, track when you changed wiper blades, brake pads, tyres etc.
Kitchen/Diet logs: Track how often you dine out, record the date you started a new can of cooking oil to track how long it lasts, how often you ate unhealthy food cakes, doughnuts etc.
Baby Logs: Record sleep times, feed times, nappy times
Health logs: how often you had cold, flu or headache, keep daily log of your blood sugar levels, medicine intakes, blood pressure, chest pains etc
Garden maintenance: last time you put weed killer, fertiliser to your lawn
Home/Utilities Log: Electricity Recharge, Bus Pass, Cleaned bathrooms, Washed driveway etc 

Features:
+ Log any of your activity or event quickly with automatic timestamp
+ Add optional text notes, amounts or values with each event
+ Syncs event data in real-time across all your devices
+ See full history of all instances of an event and time interval between instances.
+ Swipe left or right to delete entire events
+ Simple and easy to use user interface
+ Never lose your data even if you lose or damage your phone/tablet, all event data is stored securely in Google cloud servers
+ Export event data as a CSV file
+ Option to enter or edit past occurrences of an event 
+ Easy one-time sign in with Google, Facebook or Email account
+ Lightweight and efficient app to minimise battery, data and device resources usage
+ Widget to quickly add events from home screen
+ Contains minimal unobtrusive ads
+ Two pane UI for tablets

Useful to anyone who wants to quickly log / record / note an event with automatic timestamps. Especially helpful for seniors, who may find it difficult to recollect past instances of any activity/actions. Rather than trying to remember when you last did an activity or jot it on a wall calendar, easily record them and get the history with this simple and efficient app.

Almost, but not quite, exactly what I want. All I want is individual events in chronological order. Multiple entries for specific events doesn't make sense for me. I'll probably revert to pen and paper, or a spreadsheet.
Exactly what I was looking for. Export allows only one event to be exported. I want all data of all instances to be exported.
Needs to stop the inhibition of special characters.

title: The Event App
description:
Helps engage people you meet at events, conferences, trade-shows. etc.
It is one of the widely used mobile apps by professionals for networking in conferences/expos, business events, community gatherings, and individual meetings.
 
Features of the App:
1. * Newsfeed - keep your finger on the pulse of the event. See what people are doing, view photos from the event, find trending sessions and topics, and “like” and comment on other attendee check-ins
2. * Agenda - view the full agenda and related information (session time, session description, speaker info, etc.)
3. * Attendees - see who’s at the event, and connect with them on the app  - send messages and set-up meeting
4. * Speakers – read description of your speakers and rate them from 1 to 5 star rating
5. *Menu Slider – choose from a wide variety of features to network with attendees
 
The app was created by John Galt Solutions Pvt Ltd (Procialize), a leading provider of white-labeled mobile applications for events, conferences, exhibitions and trade shows. The Single Event app platform is designed to thrill attendees and empower event organizers with powerful analytics. Create engaging, memorable events and conferences with a Procialize – Single Event app today.
 
Visit https://www.procialize.net to take your event to the next level with Procialize.
Contact us at info@procialize.in to learn how you could even create your own event guide app, conference app, exhibition app or any kind of mobile event app!

"Introducing the Exhibitor Module in the Event App. The exhibitor module allows event organisers to now host exhibitors for any event. These exhibitors can add / edit their profile, and view analytics about users who have downloaded their brochures or visited their pages. In addition, exhibitors can also send/receive 1-1 messages and meeting requests."

title: Countdown Events (Free)
description:
The new application will help you not to forget the most important events in your life calendar. You will be always aware of how much time has passed since the important date, in how many days you have to pay for the internet, when the car insurance ends, how many years have your family and friends this year, etc. The application works as a timer showing the time in different formats. I wrote this program primarily for myself for not to miss the expiry date of my bank cards, my driver's license, car insurance and all other documents that are important to me. After all, the number of documents increased year by year, and it was getting harder and harder to control the validity. This is how a need in this "smart" application appeared. 

When adding a new event, you can see how much time elapsed (in years, months, days, hours, minutes and seconds), or how much time is left before its beginning at a timer. In addition, you can configure the repetition of the event by years, months, days, hours, minutes and seconds, as well as by days of the week and months of the year. To be certain not to miss an important event there is an alert – you’ll hear an audio signal and will see the event in the pop-top menu. If necessary, you can disable the notification of the selected events.

There are also two types of widgets in the application. The first shows two closest to the coming events. The second widget can be added multiple times with different selected calendar events in it. Widgets will help you to be always aware of the time remaining to the date of the event, without going into the app. System call to the widget is made only once a minute, saving the battery of your device.

To simplify the search of the events the sorting by groups was added. You can add new groups and include your calendar events to them, such as birthdays or the validity of important documents. Also there is a quick search on the text in the names and descriptions of events. In addition, in order not to get lost in the large number of events you can change the color of their background.

The main features of the application are: 
•	 viewing time remaining to the event at a timer. 
•	 viewing the elapsed time after the date of the event (years, months, days, hours, minutes, seconds).
•	 sorting the events by groups (birthdays, documents, important events, etc.) 
•	 enabling the repetition of events by years, months, days, hours, minutes, seconds, as well as by the days of the week and months of the year. 
•	 enabling alerts when the event is coming. 
•	 changing the background color for each event separately. 
•	 adding a widget of the closest calendar events. 
•	 adding an unlimited number of widgets for the selected events. 
•	 fast text search of names and descriptions of events.
•	 the function "Active mode" (display always on).

This version of the application is absolutely free and contains ads, but you can get rid of it by purchasing the paid version of the application. This application does not require internet connection. The app works with any screen size and changes the font size depending on the size of the screen. 

I would be very happy if this ‘smart’ application will help you too! Thank you!

title: Revelry - Event Planner
description:
Revelry - Event Planner provides you with ease of mind when planning your next major event! 

Revelry - Event Planner is a free to use event planning app, allowing you to take back control of the daunting task of event planning. Allow Revelry - Event Planner to track your expenditure, to simplify your guest list, to manage your tasks, as well as show you simple yet powerful overviews of your event.

Revelry gives you all the tools you need to plan weddings, parties, as well as birthdays.

Features:
• Set a budget and be informed about how much you're spending
• Add tasks in your to-do list
• Have a simplified guest list
• Set a venue, a caterer, and a photographer
• View a quick to read overview of your event
• Intuitive UI, designed with ease of use in mind
• Multi-currency support


Revelry - Event Planner is continuously updated to polish and refine the user experience. Think there should be a new feature in the app? Send your suggestions and recommendations to dominic.mobility@gmail.com.

title: My Big Days - Events Countdown
descriptionHTML:
Stylish and lightweight app to remember and track your events in a simple and fast!

View the remaining days or days elapsed after an event. You can use it to remind you: appointments, anniversaries, birthdays, holidays, exams, events festivals... customize with your own photos or use the search feature that finds thousands of free images on Pixabay!
You can also create an alarm for each individual event. You can choose a favorite event to be displayed every time you open the app!

Features:
- Choose the event image, from: camera, gallery or search online on Pixabay;
- Creates a notification for each event;
- You can choose a favorite event for display at startup;
- Days remaining before an event;

- Double click on the countdown to change the color;
- Drag the countdown wherever you want;
- List of all events;
- Unlimited number of events!
- You can change the color of the app;
- Choose the font you prefer;
- Share an event on social networks or with your favorite applications, save, print, copy, use as background Wallpaper!

@bigdaysapp

title: Event Wedding Planner, Conference, RSVP - EventCha
description:
We are the #1 FREE App for creating and managing any kind of event: Conference, Symposium, Charity Function, Corporate Event, Wedding, Birthday, Baby Shower, Anniversary and more!

**CONFERENCES & CHARITY EVENTS**
- Create a Schedule with detailed information and attendees can personalize their itinerary with My Schedule
- Add Speakers, Exhibitors, Sponsors, and Maps
- Guest registration with text and email invites, and RSVP
- Link to your website and sell tickets
- Chat with all conference attendees on your RSVP list
- Add a donate button to link to your own site
- Crowd source all the attendee photos and videos
- Engage guests after the event with follow up notifications for future events
- Useful for promoting an event, symposium, marathon, race, walk, gala, fundraiser, and more

**CREATE PRIVATE EVENTS**
- Invite guests to your corporate event, wedding, baby shower, party, etc. and get notified when people RSVP
- Create a link to your website, donation page, or registry
- Control who gets to see and share your event
- Text or email invites, or use a hashtag to search for events

**CHAT**
Give your attendees the best event app that has a free and easy way to chat.  Imagine running a silent auction at your next charity event where people text in their bids!  How about communicating event updates in real time?  EventCha has free push notifications! Make EventCha your communication and planning hub.  Think about using the app for organizing a pot luck or for a boot camp workout group.  Chat would work great to get all the guests in a wedding party interacting.  The best part of our chat is that once the event organizer has created the event, all the guests can immediately start chatting in the event without being connected.

**MY SCHEDULE**
Create your own personalized schedule for the conference, symposium, or convention.  Confirm your attendance at each session by adding them to My Schedule when the event organizer limits the capacity.

**SPEAKERS, SPONSORS, EXHIBITORS**
Get in touch with the speakers, sponsors, and exhibitors at your conference.  Don't waste time exchanging business cards or writing stuff down.  Just open the app and access all the emails, websites, and descriptions for all the speakers, sponsors, and exhibitors.

**DONATE BUTTON**
For your next charity event or wedding registry, just use the donate button and add your website's link.  It's free and easy - don't make people type or remember long websites!  The donate button makes it seamless for your guests to act.

**MAPS**
Add maps for your events.  Imagine having to coordinate a large venue or multiple sessions in different locations.  You can add a map for every single session in your schedule.

title: Event Flow Calendar Widget
descriptionHTML:
Event Flow is a clean and beautiful calendar widget that displays your agenda or calendar, with lots of features and customization options.


What you get
- Agenda widget, with a list of your events grouped by day;
- Calendar widget, with a (resizable) month view;
- Extensive customization: you can change the background and font colors, the font type and its density, customize the header, etc;
- Preset themes, with nice defaults for colors, fonts and other options;
- Select which calendar events to display;
- Weather forecast for up to 5 days on the agenda widget (premium version only);
- And more.


This widget is free, but some configuration options are locked. To unlock, click "upgrade" and you'll be able to buy the premium version via Google Play.


Permissions
We dislike apps that ask a lot of permissions without justifying them. So here's what we need and why:
Calendar: To read your calendar events. Without this permission the widget doesn't work, so it is mandatory.
Location: To show the weather forecast for your location. This is optional, you can opt not to grant this permission and not show the weather forecast or manually choose a location for the forecast.


Hope you enjoy it, and if you have any questions, issues or just want to get in touch, email us at synced.synapse@gmail.com
summary: Clean and beautiful calendar widget, with lots of customization options.
developerAddress:
Rua Rio Ave, N 132
2775-384 Carcavelos
Lisboa, Portugal
recentChanges:
Unfortunately we had to remove the option to show the weather in the free version. The weather provider we were using closed down and we couldn't find a suitable replacement. Sorry for the inconvenience.

On the premium version the option to show the weather is still available.

This version includes a new option to customize the text shown when there are no events and several "under the hood" improvements, that should make the widget more efficient.
comments: I really like the app. I wish there was a way to change the colors of event indicators on the calendar. The colors are not custom and they don't match the colors on my Google Calendar. They just seem to be random. Also, when I tap on a specific day on the calendar or the event, it should take me to that day that I picked, instead of just the month.
Great app but needs other basic features. I wish there was a way to change the color of the time of the event to something else so that way I can have a better contrast.

Works great. Just what I needed. It is useful and can be added to the home screen. However, I'm using it in Samsung DeX. To do that I needed to combine it with Floating Apps. It can open all apps in a floating window and can get apps to be maximized, when DeX can't do as well. I switched to DeX because I'm using a pogo charger on my Galaxy Tab S4 tablet. Floating Apps is awesome.
I bought the upgrade and everything was working well until the recent update. Now I cannot go into Google calendar from the widget at home screen. Also, the widget does not refresh.

I have paid just now in 15 min after installing for Calendar widget customizations only !!! Please, consider one very important thing --- to give an option to HIDE weekdays header. That way it will look extremely classy and minimalistic !!!

title: OutShot : Event Photo Album App
description:
Be There. Anytime, Anywhere

What is OutShot ?
• You cannot attend your son birthday, your best friend wedding or a family party?  Don't miss a thing and get in real-time photos taken and shared by guests.

• Create your event and invite friends and family to attend and share photos.

• Your events photos collected, organised and available in one safe place.

How does OutShot work ?
• Event : Create an event, share photos and invite friends and family.

• Photo : Share photos in your event or an event you are invited to with guests and people who cannot attend.

• Reaction : React to photos by taking and sharing Selfies.

• Invitation : Search and invite people by username or share an invitation code via SMS, email or social networks.

What are OutShot core features ?
• Events : See your events and events you have been invited to.

• Photos : See your photos, photos from your event and photos from events you have been invited to.

• Reactions : See your reactions and reactions on your photos.

• Guests : See who is joining and invited to your event or events you have been invited to.

• Camera : Share photos in your event or an event you are attending or react to photos by taking selfies.

• New Event From : Enter your event informations, create your event and invite your friends and family.

• Invitation Code Form : Enter the invitation code shared to you by the event organiser or a guest and start interacting with the event.

• Profile : Manage your profile informations and your notifications settings.
descriptionHTML:
Be There. Anytime, Anywhere



What is OutShot ?


• You cannot attend your son birthday, your best friend wedding or a family party? Don't miss a thing and get in real-time photos taken and shared by guests.

• Create your event and invite friends and family to attend and share photos.

• Your events photos collected, organised and available in one safe place.

How does OutShot work ?


• Event : Create an event, share photos and invite friends and family.

• Photo : Share photos in your event or an event you are invited to with guests and people who cannot attend.

• Reaction : React to photos by taking and sharing Selfies.

• Invitation : Search and invite people by username or share an invitation code via SMS, email or social networks.

What are OutShot core features ?


• Events : See your events and events you have been invited to.

• Photos : See your photos, photos from your event and photos from events you have been invited to.

• Reactions : See your reactions and reactions on your photos.

• Guests : See who is joining and invited to your event or events you have been invited to.

• Camera : Share photos in your event or an event you are attending or react to photos by taking selfies.

• New Event From : Enter your event informations, create your event and invite your friends and family.

• Invitation Code Form : Enter the invitation code shared to you by the event organiser or a guest and start interacting with the event.

• Profile : Manage your profile informations and your notifications settings.
summary: Event photo album app with friends and family
recentChanges: User experience improvements and bug fixes.
comments: Fantastic for weddings and birthdays
Great app. Keep up the good work
Super easy to use
Was helpful to keep in touch with my son birthday
Great concept

title: Event Check-ins
description:
Event Check-ins adds seamless event and ticketing functionality to WordPress websites that use the FooEvents plugin. The app makes it easy to manage access to events. 

Features include:

- View all attendees registered for your event
- View attendee information (name, status, phone number etc.)
- View event profiles (time, location, GPS coordinates etc.)
- Search for attendees by name or ticket ID
- Filter by checked-in, blocked, or absent attendees
- Bulk update ticket statuses
- Scan ticket barcodes (1D barcodes & QR codes) to identify attendee
- Support for multiple events
- Customise the logo and colors in the FooEvents for WooCommerce plugin settings panel
- Enable auto check-in to speed up the check-in process at events
- Enable offline mode to use all functionality without having to connect to the internet
- Offline mode is automatically enabled when internet connectivity is lost
- Can be paired with a handheld Bluetooth barcode scanner
descriptionHTML:
Event Check-ins adds seamless event and ticketing functionality to WordPress websites that use the FooEvents plugin. The app makes it easy to manage access to events.

Features include:

- View all attendees registered for your event
- View attendee information (name, status, phone number etc.)
- View event profiles (time, location, GPS coordinates etc.)
- Search for attendees by name or ticket ID
- Filter by checked-in, blocked, or absent attendees
- Bulk update ticket statuses
- Scan ticket barcodes (1D barcodes & QR codes) to identify attendee
- Support for multiple events
- Customise the logo and colors in the FooEvents for WooCommerce plugin settings panel
- Enable auto check-in to speed up the check-in process at events
- Enable offline mode to use all functionality without having to connect to the internet
- Offline mode is automatically enabled when internet connectivity is lost
- Can be paired with a handheld Bluetooth barcode scanner
summary: Easily manage access to your event.
recentChanges:
Added support for scanning QR codes
Added support for external Bluetooth barcode scanners
Added REST API integration to improve app connectivity to your site
Fixed a bug which caused the app to crash for users running Android 10
Minor bug fixes and performance improvements
comments: App keeps crashing, can't even open. I see talk about a 1.4.1 version but it's not available on the play store so I can't update to it! I even tried an uninstall and reinstall which reinstalled 1.4.0, the version that consistently crashes. Please fix!!! And test before you release new versions...
I was having issues launching the app but the support team was very responsive and resolved the issue very quickly and professionally. App works great now. Thank you!
So far it worked on first run Pixel 2. No longer works and crashes on launch. After clearing cache and data it crashes after successful login. After updating. Instantly crashes.
Last update not working on my phone , its crashing all time

Works fine on Samsung S8. Also confirmed that it works on the Samsung S10. FooEvents needs Woocommerce user rights and xmlrpc.php should be accessible. Dont worry about these low noob reviews. Truth is, FooEvents is difficult to setup but works as expected! Its not perfect but it WORKS and is a very affordable solution. I am very happy with it and am using it for an upcoming event in 6 months. Hope the app and the plugin keep working. I have done extensive testing, so it will probably be fine.

title: Invitations, Guest RSVP, Event & Party Planning
description:
Merry Christmas and Happy New Year 2020, PotluckHub is an easy way to host your event. Create an event, invite your friends, add food and other items to bring to the event. Invitees can RSVP and pick their items of choice. In-app chat feature helps you coordinate with your friends and keep the event planning going. Add event photos and share with every participant. Christmas and New Year are coming. Get ready for Christmas and New Year events. Host Christmas and New Year events in simple steps. make this Christmas and New Year event day memorable by celebrating with friends and families.

Main Features

~ Create an Event:  Create the event in a few simple steps. Name the event, add the location, date and time, provide an interesting description. You are all set to go!

~ Invite your friends: Invite your friends to the event using the phone's contact list. Keep a track of who has accepted the invite, and remind those who have not. Get notified of each RSVP.

~ Add food and other items to the Pot: Each participant can pick items of their choice, and add more items to the pot.

~ Group Chat: Chat with the participants for the event using the in-app chat in PotluckHub. Keep everyone posted about any updates, discuss the plans, and keep the event planning exciting.

~ Share event Photos(beta): Upload and share awesome photos of the event with your friends. See all the event photos shared by all participants here like an album.

~ Memories: One of the best ways to make yourself happy in the present is to recall happy times from the past. All the happy moments you celebrated with PotluckHub are stored in "Memories". Look back and cherish those fun times, and plan the next event with PotluckHub!.

PotluckHub is a great RSVP invitation app. PotluckHub makes RSVP invitation more simple and easy. Invite your friends using PotluckHub. This app manages all your invitations for an event and you will get notifications of each RSVP Invitation.

Potluck as a Party Planner: Thinking about having friends over, but too busy to plan the entire meal and event? Host an event! Potluck is a wonderful way to have a great get together with friends and family with less effort. Be it a weekend get together with friends, Christmas event, New Year event, Thanksgiving dinner with family, Valentines Day, watching cricket or soccer match with friends, planning a camping trip ...You name it -  PotluckHub is there to help you plan an awesome party or event in style. Create the potluck in a few simple steps. Name the event, add the location, date and time, provide an interesting description. You are all set to go!

PotluckHub can be used as an event manager, event planner, potluck planner etc. PotluckHub makes event planning and event managing easy and simple. It's very easy to get celebrate with friends and families.

You can use PotluckHub as a Christmas event planner and New Year event planner.

Download PotluckHub and enjoy!

comments: Great flow! Love the setup. Not as customizable as it potentially could be (ie how often the event could occur) But thanks alot for putting the effort into a great idea
Keeps crashing after I've added all of my info. Should automatically save your information. I've had to start over 2 times already. Super frustrating but great concept.
copying your entire contact list seems to be its opening move and the only thing it excels at.
I've tried several times to open this app and can't. Several of my friends had the same problem so I will be deleting the app and not using it again.
Love the app, but people cannot RSVP without downloading, which makes it difficult to invite everyone and keep track of who replied

title: TickPick - No Fee Tickets
description:
The fastest, cheapest and easiest app to purchase tickets to all of your favorite events (sports, concerts & theater). With No Service Fees and a unique Score Report (to help you find the best deals) buying great tickets at great prices has never been this easy.

100% guaranteed ticket marketplace. Resellers may list tickets above or below face value.

--FEATURES—

1. Discovery – Find last minute events and deals in your area – or search any team, artist, event or venue to see schedules and available tickets.
2. Sorting - Overwhelmed by too many ticket options? Filter by price, quantity, and Seat Rating (determine by seat location, available only on TickPick).
3. Deals - Tickets are ranked by our patented Score Report (determined by price and seat location), which helps you get the best bang for your buck!
4. High Rollers - Use our proprietary 'Seat Rating' to sort tickets from the best seats in the house to the worst.
5. Seat Views - For all major sports see pictures of your seats before you buy tickets.
6. Track Events – Not ready to buy? Keep track of key event stats so you can make the best buying decision when you're ready.
7. Payment - At checkout, just scan your credit card and turn your device into your ticket.

summary: Save money on concert, sport, and theater tickets, and discover upcoming events.
recentChanges: Some under the hood updates to make sure your no fee ticket experience is as smooth as possible.
comments: Game I purchased tickets to has been canceled. Trying to get a hold of someone regarding either a refund or a voucher. Instead, their help line causes the app to crash. It's been this way for days now. Regretting my decision to use this app.

Way to step up!!! I purchased a few hundred dollars worth of Spring training tickets through this app. TickPick was the first to refund my tickets! I also purchased tickets directly from MLB, as of today I'm still waiting for refund instructions...
If you have questions clicking the "Need Help" button immediately crashes the app. So if say your event was cancelled and you want to know how to proceed - you're out of luck.
Cannot find contact information to get assistance. Everytime I click get help the app crashes, deleted and reinstalled app still doesn't work. Went to actual website and cannot find contact info
Even though the service charge is technically built into the price on TickPick, it still comes out at least 15% less than if you buy from Ticketmaster or other services that charge service fees.

description:

title: SWE Event Apps
description:
The official mobile app for Society of Women Engineers Events, allows users to search or browse sessions and create a customized schedule. Attendees can also provide feedback and access other meeting materials from the app.

Other features include:

• Ability to add and e-mail annotations to sessions in your schedule and take offline PowerPoint notes
• Network with experts and other professionals at the event
• Exhibitor list, including company descriptions and booth numbers that link to an exhibit hall map 
• Twitter feed that highlights what attendees are saying about the meeting
• Home: Stay informed about hot issues, event program changes, your upcoming sessions and organizer messages

Future Events Will Include: 
WE Annual Conference
WE International Conferences
WE Local Conferences

Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

ATIV Software
340 S Lemon Ave #4605
Walnut, CA 91789
recentChanges: Update to 9.0.0!
comments: I am a developer myself and I really dislike this app. It uses unpleasant colors and doesn't have useful features like exporting events to the calendar. I feel like I am using a website or something instead of a native Android app since it doesn't follow any of the Material Design Principles. Also it has JavaScript errors now and then which makes it feel like the app is in a testing mode with debugging outputs.

It is unfortunate that the app is the only way to figure out where the event is held and what the schedule is!  Normally, I would be like any other regular person who has a phone, but both my phones are acting up and have short battery life.  I can barely use the app because my main phone shuts off as soon as the app is loaded.  The other phone is just really slow and has no more memory to download.  I wish there was a web version of the app.
Easy to use. Updates regularly so my information is always relevant!
Like others have commented, the app is not updating when I delete and reinstall the new version. I need the app tonight and can only see last year's local event schedule.
Great App 👌, lovely and detailed contents.

title: Event Badger
description:
EventBadger lets you place your trade show, conference or convention visit. Select everything you want to see, review your selection before the event, and, once the event starts, find only the things you are interested in.

Additional features:

- Filters to show you only things that might be interesting. You don't have to look through everything.
- All data is downloaded onto your device. You don't have to worry about cell phone reception at the event.

Currently supported events:

- Essen Spiel 2018, back for round two.
- SPIEL DOCH 2018, the new consumer board game fair in Spring.
- Essen Spiel 2017, the biggest board game fair in the world.

Gethsemanestr. 3,
10437 Berlin
Germany
recentChanges: Fix for skipped games being shown on map as seen.
comments: It's been a great help over at Essen, but there is some space for improvements. Namely things like searching the full list of games with designer, or theme, or mechanics. The preview of the games got stuck when I reached a game that I had previously skipped and I couldn't select skip again. Maybe I used it wrong somehow, but it became less useful for me then. The filter didn't work that wel either. Still highly recommended.

This app was essential for my experience at Essen Spiel this year. I used it all the time (never used the paper version given by the event).The capacity of locating the games on the map was invaluable, and the developer was very active and nice in the BGG board. I hope this gets picked up for other events.
It seems there is a bug on Android. When marking games as skipped, they get shown on the map as Must See. And when clicking on the wrong marker on the map, the app crashes.

Tried this and a few others for Essen Spiel 2018 and liked this one the best. It gave me the maps I wanted and let me pick spots I wanted to visit, and it was all laid out easy to find. Looking forward to using it next year.
Essential helper for organizing and getting around your visit to Essen.

Create new event either public or private using Events Around
Share Events with friends

Event Creator will get list of all Attendees

title: World Wide Events
description:
★★★★★
This Event/Venue aggregator search 🔍 the web (facebook, meetup, eventbrite,...) an puts all the Events/Venues on a beautiful Website built over Material Design.
Don't waste more time searching on dozens of different websites just to know what Events/Venues 📅 are near you.
World Wide Events it's completely anonymous 👻 No need for logins 🔑, passwords 🔓, complications or configurations!

FEATURES
★ Works for every country 🌍 and in real-time.
★ Enable/Disable Notifications and receive Push Notifications 🔔 You can configure intervals of 1-7-30 days with no impact in performance and battery. By Default Notifications are Enabled and you can change them in a click of a button 💡
★ Control and Manage Permissoes in Settings 🔨 By default the App don't ask for permissions and work with no special permissions.
★ Open and Share links from Browser or other Apps to inside the App. The App fully integrate with Android Open/Share Menu 📱
✔ Get the event description and location.
✔ Share 🎈 the event with anyone by direct link or on social networks.
✔ The crawler search the web (facebook, meetup, eventbrite,...) and gives you all the Events available for a target location.
✔ Save 💾 the event to your Calendar (Google/Outlook/Yahoo/Apple Calendar 📅).
✔ Search by city/country or with GPS 📡 coordinates.
✔ Search on a range of 20km around you ⭐
✔ World Wide Events fits in a 1Mb App 🎯 and don't consume background resources. It won't slow 🐢 your smartphone 📱
✔ Find Events/venues divided in 20 categories: Music 🎵, Sports 🏆, Shopping 🎁, Travel ✈, Entertainment 🎮, ...

CHROME EXTENSION
💻 World Wide Events is also available as a Chrome Extension for Win/Mac/Linux computers. Get it on Google Chrome Webstore: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/world-wide-events/dkinhdlboeoghbjhlcjkecabacjgefcp

💎 +40 Apps for Google Chrome and Android 🔥 +1 Million active users Worldwide 📣

LEGAL
World Wide Events is a trademark of Oinkandstuff.

PRIVACY POLICY & TERMS OF SERVICE
