title: Event Countdown
description:
Let’s put a limit to putting reminder-pins and sticky pads on your calendar every time you need to place an event post or need to update your diary with an event entry. How would you feel to have a unified platform where you could organise all your events, be it a notable ceremony which presumes your presence or a to-do task which needs your attention. 

With more than just counting down to your best moments, Event Countdown also provides a built-in reminder functionality which lets you know about the event and details for the date and time added, so that you can always count on Event Countdown to keep you updated on your yearly, monthly and weekly plans. View your favourite events, Birthday, Wedding, Anniversary, Vacation and Other Holidays right there at the home screen portrayed in a timelined manner so that you always know which one is happening first.


Key Features →

★ Add multiple events for your preferred category according to your preference. Have two weddings coming up in this month? No problem, just let us count down the days for you.

★ We have added in a countdown timer for each of your events so that you can always know how much more steps are there to reach your day. Start preparing when you know it’s near.

★ Add a reminder for an event if you need to prepare yourself and who knows, maybe check-in to a gift shop to buy a fancy gift. Always keep yourself alerted prior to the day of the event.

★ Check your schedule and know when to pick the dates, right from the home screen itself with our customized home screen widget where you can get a quick peek at your favorite events lined up for you.

★ Deep link your searches to get your events in one shorter step by searching based on the added location or category. You know when and where to find your events with Event Countdown app.

★ Always keep it simple for a snappy pick-out using the filter option where you can view your events based on week, month or year. Get a perspective to arrange your occasions accordingly.

★ Get back to us and let us know how you feel about the app, and your ideas brought together which can help us in improving the app to your needs. Submit your feedback and start reaching us now.

A perfect memorandum for all your events lined up according to your preference. No more “save the date” memes. Event Countdown makes one step lighter for you, so that we can save each and every one of your occasions and memories in store for you. Everything from our history and everything you need can find can be at your reach in just a click. From searching and finding your dates to planning your customary outing to the gala, Event Countdown can be your cue to a one way date-planner. 

Rolling out further updates to keep you use handy and smart, Event Countdown focuses in delivering not only just a timely solution, but also helps to your events handy and arranged. 

Experience a simple yet unique solution to help you with your event reminders and notices, with Event Countdown.

Download now to explore more.

title: Countdown Time - Event Countdown & Big Days Widget
description:
Countdown Time tracks upcoming events in beauty and elegance.


Have your most anticipated events right at your fingertips with Countdown Time.  Events are tracked to the second in real-time with razor accuracy. Feel the excitement as the day draws closer and share it with friends and family.
Pick from hundreds of beautiful backgrounds to truly bring your event to life and make the day uniquely yours.

Features
✔ Track as many events as you want
✔ Fully customizable widget
✔ Beautiful, sleek and elegant design
✔ Multiple themes
✔ Pick from hundreds of HD backgrounds or use your own
✔ Daily countdown notifications
✔ Personalize your event with display modes and headings
✔ Built-in event sharing


Start the countdown!
Events are what make life shine. They are the moments we will forever be looking back on; and the moments we can't wait for. Whether it's your sister's wedding, your son's graduation or your own birthday, you know that it will be a day to remember.
Use it for a holiday trip, vacation travel abroad or an anniversary that you can't forget. Keep track of big days like Christmas or New Years eve. Daily notifications will keep you up to date with your events and milestones while the widget gives you an instant glance at your date.
Forgo a clunky calendar for a sleek and beautiful countdown timer: It's your big day and you need it to be as magnificent as it can. A simple calendar won't do it justice. The count down starts today - set your clock.

More than just Christmas, weddings and birthdays
Use Countdown Time for tracking any event. Any event at all! Set up a countdown app to a big presentation, track the seconds until a family dinner, set the widget to count down to your birthday or measure the amount of breaths until a romantic date.
No day is too big or too small to be tracked in the app. It's completely up to you and what you want your milestones to be. Set your date and let Countdown Time and its widget take care of your vacation, holiday or wedding day.

Your day, your way
It's your event and you get to choose how you want the clock to count down to it. Choose the full-on experience by opening the app or an at-a-glance look with the resizeable widget.
Count down in days, heartbeats, years and more - just pick the display mode that fits your big day. The app comes with breathtaking backgrounds that go with any occasion: from wedding days and to travel.
Your clock is what you want it to be and your date is when you want it to be. Choose from 15 app themes to personalize your count down clock.

Build the excitement. Share the moment.
Your excited about the big day - that's why they are called big days after all! You go to bed every night with dreams of your vacation in Paris or your wedding date. Or both - perhaps your wedding is in Paris while you're on vacation! Up the anticipation by adding a daily reminder of these big days to your life.
Count down the days to your next big holiday and share it with your friends and family. The built-in sharing lets you instantly share a beautiful snapshot of your clock with friends and family. Use the gentle daily notifications as a reminder to get Christmas presents.
Show your loved ones how many days until your birthday to hint for that "surprise" birthday party. Count the days until your graduation and freedom. 



Get Countdown Time now to bring excitement and anticipation to your big events!

comments: I love it!! I think the aesthetic of the app is very cute; I love the background choices, the icon choices, the fonts, & you can decide if you want your countdown to be in days, weeks, months, or years. There are also no ad popups, which makes the app look so classy & I really appreciate that.

Does exactly what it says it does. Easy interface, pleasing widgets, and plenty of options for a free app. Yes, there are occasional 5-second ads when inside the app (NOT when the widget is passively displayed), but the devs deserve to get paid. I don't find them at all disruptive or intrusive, but that's just my opinion.

Wrong calculations. The app seems confused by it being leap year and the countdown is short by 1 day. Super annoyed that I've been using this and just realized it's been wrong. Also, the backgrounds and icons are limited, nothing special. Which I would be fine with if the count was accurate.

Perfect to track your goals. Clean design and very affordable price if you want to go premium to unlock backups and remove ads, in one pay, without subscriptions. Thanks. :) Feedback: It would be great to have some kind of menu and (less important) search engine to improve the experience for when you have a lot of active countdowns.

This application is really good. The application have some sort og widgets which are more useful than the application really is. It would be a really great app if this app would be a live wallpaper. One of the feature that could be made to make the app handy is by making the application's widget completely transparent in the screen.

title: EventMobi
description:
The EventMobi app allows you to instantly access information about the event you’re attending and participate in related event activities. 

To get started, download the app and enter the unique event code provided by your event organizer.

Access the mobile experience for your event to:
- See what’s coming up next at the event and manage your schedule
- Grow your network by participating in group discussions or 1-on-1 messaging
- Be part of the presentation with live polls and Q&A
- Compete with fellow attendees in event challenges
- Share insights, take notes, and access additional materials

Hosting or attending multiple events? Events Pages allow participants to stay up to date on current and upcoming events, while providing easy ongoing access to past event information.

Are you an event planner? Visit eventmobi.com to learn how you can use the EventMobi platform to create your own incredible event experiences.

Great App fo your events!

title: Calendar Event Reminder
description:
If you are tired of short "beep" reminders of calendar and often miss an important event, put and end to it with this app!
 
With this simple app you can override or replace default reminder with "unmissable" ones - they will ring like phone call how long you want, with melody you want! All you need is to install app - and that's all! No complex setup, no overcomplicated settings, just install app and that's it - app will automatically do all work.
 
IMPORTANT: 99% of problems with app are caused by energy saving mode, please read FAQ to add my app as an exception, thanks :)
 
FAQ: http://mil84.com?tab=faq&cat=faq_cer&lng=en

comments: No snoozing after the end of the event.You says "there is no point to continue".Excuse me but yes it is! For example, I put a reminder to call a friend on Friday 9h00 every week. Sometimes I have a meeting, or I'm driving, or working on something else.Reschedule for 30 min,2hours,1day makes sense. This was possible with the now missed app "calendar snooze" (ot supported anymore).Please have a look!many will come here as there is no alternative.please allow long snooze and snooze buttons presets.

Just bought full app so I can get full functionality. I typically have my phone in silent for what that's worth. The events are popping up along with my Google calendar event, the alarm doesn't chime unless I clock on the event. Then it counts down and Auto snoozes, and leaves a notice of a missed reminder, 15 minutes later it should fire off again but nothing. Emailed the developer but no response, hoped it'd work but no luck yet.

UPDATE; Developer has been very responsive in providing suggestions to resolve issues that developed due to device update to Android 10. As of now, the initial alerts are reliable, though I still have occasional issues with snoozed alarms--perhaps due to interference with other apps. Best app I've found for its purpose.

Update 24/02/20 This WAS a great App, now it doesn't work on Android Pie (9) or Android (7) Nor a friends Android 10.. I've turned off Optimisation on two phones and turned off the other calendars. Such a shame. I relied on this for everything. Having the same issues as others recently. With two alarms going off and not being able to snooze, unreliable alarms, it not popping up and over riding the screen, If I touch the screen anywhere it stops.I've spoken to Google and Samsung and they agree there must be an update needed for the app. Update 4/12/19 I've now got the paid version which is GREAT. Exactly what I need. Thank you Milan! Ocasionally when I touch the phone to snooze, it stops the alarm. I've added the app to the list that isn't energy saved. Some tones/sounds from other sources dont work with this App. The free version is in my opinion completely pointless as you can't change the alarm duration and so it's a one off sound alarm, which is the same as my phones calendar. The developer responds quickly & tries to help.

Calendar event notification alarm works but follows my ring tone setting. That's, it won't vibrate nor sound off if my ringer is in silent or vibrate mode. Down side, it has only few snooze time options. It would be nice to have less than 5min and 1day snooze. I will consider the checking out the Pro version. This app is the only one that I found that works like an alarm-like notification with snooze. One other app that worked had stopped working even with the keyed version purchased. THANKS MS!

title: Eventdex-Event Management App
description:
Eventdex is a Mobile first platform for your events. It is a complete suite of mobile apps for events that includes features like Lead Retrieval App for Trade Shows, Event Registration, Event Management Software, Event Ticketing, Onsite Event Registration App, Mobile Check-In App, Lead Scanning, One on one Matchmaking ,Business Matchmaking App and Attendee Check-In.

Features:

• User friendly and dynamic Event Information including Schedule, Location Map, List of Exhibitors, Sponsors,       Speakers

• Ability to dynamically view the registered seminars, add seminars to my schedule

• Social connectivity including Twitter feed for event hashtag

• Scan QR codes , Barcodes and convert them to leads

• Option to connect with attendees using push notifications with out the need for scanning badges

• Store leads from events in your mobile

• Send leads instantly to web portal

• Rate leads as Hot or Cold

• Make notes about each lead you scan

• Send an email to a lead with your business details

• Forward lead details as an attachment to any one in csv format

• Set a reminder to follow-up with a lead

title: Event Management
description:
►Event management is the application of project management to the creation and development of large-scale events such as festivals, conferences, ceremonies, weddings, formal parties, concerts, or conventions. It involves studying the brand, identifying its target audience, devising the event concept, and coordinating the technical aspects before actually launching the event.✦

►The process of planning and coordinating the event is usually referred to as event planning and which can include budgeting, scheduling, site selection, acquiring necessary permits, coordinating transportation and parking, arranging for speakers or entertainers, arranging decor, event security, catering, coordinating with third party vendors, and emergency plans. Each event is different in its nature so process of planning & execution of each event differs on basis of type of event.✦

【Topics Covered In This App are Listed Below】

*Introduction

*Event Manager

*Event Management as an Industry

*Career in Event Management

*Budget Of Event

*Organizing A Media Event

*Eleven key steps for organizing a media event

*Event Promotion

*What is the Media Kit?

*Exhibitions

*Exhibition planning mainly involves

*Why Exhibitions Sell?

*Benefits of Exhibitions

*Objective of Holding an Exhibition

*Display work for your Exhibition

*Budgeting

*Publicity, Promotion And PR

*Safety and Security

*Dealing with the Visitors

*Trade Fair

*Exhibits Are Crucial

*Portable

*Trade offs

*Trade Lighting

*Trade Fair Promotions

*Trade Show Promotion – using gimmicks to promote your booth at the trade show

*Pre- Trade Show Promotion

*Eight Rules for Giveaways

*Setup and Dismantle Help

*Service after the Show

*Hurdles Of Trade Fair

title: WhenDidI Lite - Event Tracker
description:
Is tracking your day to day events being difficult for you? Do you lose track of your daily activities? Look no further. Start using this powerful configurable event tracking app - WhenDidI Lite - Event Tracker to track your daily activities. This unique event tracking app includes widget support, alerts, backup capabilities to your local SD card and Dropbox, and a full range of functions to easily manage and analyse your events. The event tracking app also lets you send your event list using email.
Still wondering or thinking of events that you could track using the “WhenDidI Lite - Event Tracker” app? Here are the examples of events that you could track using this app -
	•	How many calories you consumed
	•	How many pints of alcohol drank
	•	Cost of lunch per day
	•	When you last feed the baby
	•	Time spent at the gym
Get smarter while tracking your daily, weekly or monthly events with ease using your smartphone. WhenDidl includes unique features to make event tracking fun.

**************************
APP FEATURES
**************************
Still wondering what makes “WhenDidl Lite - Event Tracker” app unique among all other apps to track your regular events? Here are the features of the app that make it incredible - 

	•	Fully customizable so you can configure it based on your needs
	•	Create & edit event categories to measure quantity, price or just as a counter
	•	Set reminder alerts for daily, weekly and monthly events
	•	Alerts can be combined with sound and speech when due
	•	Feature to add notes to your events
	•	View statistics for your events
	•	Share your events as csv in email attachments
	•	Multiple home screen widgets
	•	Backup to SD card storage or Dropbox
	•	Graphical view of events with charts
	•	Quick links or shortcuts to add events, view monthly lists, etc.

Download the app "WhenDidI Lite - Event Tracker" and start making event tracking fun. Get started to organize your events using your smartphone right now.

** Stopwatch Integration **
Our sister app, Watson Stopwatches and Timers integrates with “WhenDidI - Event Tracker”. Watson contains multiple stopwatches, which you can set up to publish to WhenDidI. 

** Required Permissions **
	•	Write external Storage - this is needed to backup your data to your internal SD card
	•	Internet - for backup to Dropbox and bug reports
	•	Google Accounts - for backup to Google Drive

** Lite Version **
Note that the lite version is limited to 31 events

************************
SAY HELLO
************************
We are constantly working hard on making the “WhenDidI Lite - Event Tracker” app better and more useful for you. We need your constant support to get going. Please feel free to email us for any queries/suggestions/problems or if you just want to say hello. We would love to hear from you. If you have enjoyed any feature of the “WhenDidI Lite - Event Tracker” app, do not forget to rate us on play store and share among your friends.

• View statistics for your events
• Share your events as csv in email attachments
• Multiple home screen widgets
• Backup to SD card storage or Dropbox
• Graphical view of events with charts
• Quick links or shortcuts to add events, view monthly lists, etc.

Download the app "WhenDidI Lite - Event Tracker" and start making event tracking fun. Get started to organize your events using your smartphone right now.

** Stopwatch Integration **
Our sister app, Watson Stopwatches and Timers integrates with “WhenDidI - Event Tracker”. Watson contains multiple stopwatches, which you can set up to publish to WhenDidI.

** Required Permissions **
• Write external Storage - this is needed to backup your data to your internal SD card
• Internet - for backup to Dropbox and bug reports
• Google Accounts - for backup to Google Drive

** Lite Version **
Note that the lite version is limited to 31 events

************************
SAY HELLO
************************
We are constantly working hard on making the “WhenDidI Lite - Event Tracker” app better and more useful for you. We need your constant support to get going. Please feel free to email us for any queries/suggestions/problems or if you just want to say hello. We would love to hear from you. If you have enjoyed any feature of the “WhenDidI Lite - Event Tracker” app, do not forget to rate us on play store and share among your friends.

title: Eventoo  - Event Management Platform
description:
Welcome to Eventoo, a space where you can plan and make your dream event come true. Empowered by the passion to deliver nothing but the best, Eventoo will make sure that your event becomes the talk of the town. 

Eventoo is a platform that enables you to plan your event perfectly. Whether it’s a small-scale event with family and friends or a large-scale corporate event, Eventoo will allow you to make use of the best in class services to get everything going and in making your event a success. 
 
Whether it is planning your beautiful dream wedding, putting together the perfect anniversary celebration, creating set for themed birthday parties or celebrating a promotion, there is no event that Eventoo cannot plan for you. 

There is nothing like an event that is written in a language you love. Don’t forget to check out the special Eventoo feature that allows you to create events in different languages. 

With Eventoo, here is how you can manage your event successfully: 

•	Want to make some changes to your event? Eventoo’s flexible and user-friendly platform allows you to do that without any hassles. Don’t worry if the time is not right or if a certain decoration is not working out. Eventoo is here to share your load. 

•	Creating a guest list is one of the most important aspects of the event. After all, what is an event if not for its guests. And while you do your best to make sure you’ve invited everyone mistakes happen and often, people end up miss sending out some important invites or sending out invites to unwelcomed people. Use Eventoo to create a custom guest list in which you can add and remove guests anytime you want. You can also import guests from your contact list. 

•	Enjoy a wonderful, user-friendly and interactive dashboard view to look at your planning of the activities for the event. Track your progress and see how close you are to the event date. 

•	Chat with fellow event managing users and your guests using the instant chat feature in the app. 

•	Managing your event alone can get exhausting? Why not use Eventoo to add other users to help manage the event with you? 

•	Sending out invitations is a taxing task and it can take up a lot of time that you can spend planning instead. Worry not because we’re here to take care of that and send out invitations on your behalf. Save your precious time by sending out invites and message updates to guests using SMS/Email/Whatsapp all in a few clicks. Use the broadcast feature and send all the invites at once. 

•	One of the best parts about having an awesome event is the beautiful pictures that you have at the end of it. Use Eventoo to upload the event’s photographs and share them with guests. 

•	Add and manage sub-events to your main event list. Marriage event? Add sangeet, haldi, mehndi, baraat, and reception to and wow your guests with the ravishing event that you’ve planned. Once you add the sub-events, leave it to Eventoo to inform all the guests in the list. 

•	Planning an event is a huge responsibility and it’s easy to forget or miss out on certain deadline. With the ability to set reminders, you can make sure you don’t miss anything out and that your event is as perfect as you envisioned it to be. 

•	Gifts are a huge part of personal events and with a HUGE guest list it can get quite challenging to keep track of what gift to give to which guest. Use Eventoo to create a list of all the gifts you want to give out to your guests. Come back and manage the gift list if you want to make any changes later.

title: Event Check-In
description:
Check-in: it’s one of the most important parts of an event, but it can also be one of the most stressful. At Event Farm, we’re on a mission to make check-in a breeze for your team, and a great experience for your guests. 

The Event Farm mobile check-in app is available on Android phones and tablets and can be used in one of two ways; in conjunction with our core event marketing platform, or on it’s own for DIY guest list uploads. 

Major Benefits of the Event Farm Check-In App:

 - Online / Offline Mode Data Syncing
 - Universal usage capabilities across devices
 - Arrival Alerts
 - Leave Behinds
 - Guest List Instant Search

…. And so much more.

With Event Farm check-in, creating the right relationships to grow your business is easier than ever.

title: Countdown+ Widgets Calendar Lite
description:
Add unlimited countdowns for events with Countdown Plus Widget Calendar (also known as Countdown+) the top countdown app on Google Play! Countdown to birthdays, weddings, spring break, graduation, cruise, trips, retirement, concerts, any memorable events in your Calendar and even Facebook. Also countdown to holidays such as Christmas, Easter, New Years, Valentines, you name it. Featuring beautiful widgets with your own images and backgrounds, keeping track of events has never been more fun!

With the countdown clock display, you can tell the time to or from any event in years, months, weeks, days, hours, minutes, and even seconds. Want more notifications closer to an event? With the smart reminder feature, you configure your countdown event and get notifications more frequently as the event approaches. Never forget an event again! 

Countdown Plus Widget Calendar also features a countdown calendar for Facebook events and birthdays.  Countdown Plus integrates seamlessly with your Calendar and Facebook events to show countdowns for events and friend's birthdays. You can pick your most important Calendar events track and add to your Countdowns with a single click. This makes Countdown Plus a great Birthday Calendar. Each calendar entry is a countdown clock so you see the exact time left to each event. 

The Countdown Plus app doesn’t stop there. Configure your countdown widget to see your events directly on your home screen. From a single countdown display widget, to countdown collection widgets, you can view multiple countdowns in a stack, grid, or a simple list of countdowns.  It doesn't stop there. See the time left to your events customized with your own images. Keeping track of your events has never been easier.

You can also share your event countdowns by text message, email, Facebook, and Twitter with a snapshot of the countdown background and a link that allows family and friends to join in your countdown. 

Its not all about features either. Countdown Plus Widgets does this all with style. With a colorful fun interface, the Countdown Plus app lets you use your own photos or custom backgrounds. Configure your font, color, and position of your countdown and select from several alarm and sound options to further customize your countdown experience. 
With many settings and custom options to choose from, you have to try to experience it all. Try it today for free! 

Follow us today:
facebook.com/countdownplus
twitter.com/countdownplus
instagram.com/countdownplus

Features: 
- Track an unlimited countdowns for events 
- View your countdowns on your homescreen with widgets
- Receive notifications more frequently as the event approaches 
- Use photos from your album, or use one of the custom backgrounds included 
- Ever wonder how old you really are to the second? Count up from your actual date of birth 
- Integrates with your Calendar. See time remaining to events in your Calendar in a monthly view. 
- Integrates with your Facebook events and friends birthdays. Monthly display of birthday and events with one click quick add to your Countdowns list. 
- Auto imports your friend’s profile picture or the event image to your countdown background 
- Select time units to count in years, months, weeks, days, hours, minutes, and seconds 
- Multiple widgets and custom displays to further customize your Countdown 
- Add sticky notes to your countdown events
- Customize the countdown font, color and position 
- Multiple alarm and alert sounds to choose from 
- Share screenshots of countdown events with Friends! 
- Facebook community of users sharing in their experience with Countdown+ Widgets application

title: EventPilot Conference App
description:
The EventPilot conference app gives you instant offline access to your meeting or event program. Depending on the event, app features include:
• Personal Schedule: Build your personal daily schedule with an intuitive color coded schedule view.
• Now: Stay informed about hot issues, program changes, your upcoming sessions, Twitter feeds and organizer messages. 
• Contact Sharing: Easily share contact card information via QR or Bump technology.
• Program: Browse the entire event program to create your personal schedule, take notes, rate sessions or speakers and more. 
• PowerPoint slide viewer: Download presentations and take notes on slides while sitting in a session.
• Email Notes: Instantly create a trip report with all starred items, notes, and contacts you have made during the event.
• Twitter with tweet out functionality, expo and sponsors lists, animated conference venue maps, speaker list with photos, local information, and more.

Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

Note: Upon installation, the app will ask for device permissions. This permission request is triggered by a requirement to understand your phone state and if you have a data connection. We do not collect or track this information - the app simply needs some basic information from your OS to run. Downloaded data updates, your personal notes or stars, or your login credentials require the app to have permissions to protected storage.

title: TuliA Event Planning App- Make Any Event Special
description:
This is an event planning App that brings Event Professionals (Vendors) and Consumers( Users) together on a platform that promotes freelancers as well as brick and mortar businesses giving them the much-needed level playing field and reach to consumers who are in need of their services.
TuliA intends to make the search of Event Professionals  as easy as the touch of a button and the planning of events less stressful to Users. Users will be able to access the vendors of their choice through the different categories or use the available tools to vet Vendors through price, location and reviews without the stress of calling first.
As for Vendors, they will Create a profile with with their location, price and add media to highlight their skill or business. Vendors will  be able to select events posted to the category they  register in and will show their interest to posted events by selecting the "I am doing this event" button. They will also be able to chat with the user through a chat feature. 
WHY! worry about how to scale up your business or just how to expand your clientele? Let TuliA connect you to the consumers that are specifically in need of your services and what better place for consumers to find a single market for everything events professionals

title: Event Espresso 4
description:
Do you host events such as concerts, yoga classes, yoga lessons, training seminars, etc; and need to check people in at the door? 

With the Event Espresso WordPress plugin and our ticketing app, you can have your own registration system to manage attendees and check them in at the door. All check-ins are synced with YOUR OWN server and you can use more than one Android or Apple device at any entry point.

With the Event Espresso 4 app event managers can:

- View and check in attendees at the door
- Easily validate attendee QR Codes/Barcode using the camera-based scanner
- Check in attendees using multiple devices at the same time
- View live attendance stats

Don't rely on a third-party web site to handle your event registration and attendee management. Get your own event registration system with Event Espresso. More information at http://eventespresso.com

With the Event Espresso 4 app event managers can:

- View and check in attendees at the door

- Check in attendees using multiple devices at the same time
- View live attendance stats

title: IEEE Event Finder
description:
Are you ever out of town with time on your hands and thinking about popping into an IEEE event but don’t know if one is around? Now there’s an app that can help you find one. The new IEEE Event Finder mobile app lets you search for an event not only by its name but also by city, state, or province; by IEEE region, section, or chapter; or by the IEEE society or council sponsoring it.

It is the first app to come out of the IEEE Mobile Center of Excellence, which is developing apps for IEEE groups. The center is part of IEEE’s IT department, in Piscataway, N.J.

The app was developed in collaboration with IEEE Asia and Pacific Region members, who came up with the concept. The app was launched on 24 August in conjunction with the region’s 50th anniversary.

App Inspiration: IEEE Members in the Region 10 came up with the idea after several were surprised to learn that an IEEE event in Bangalore, India, was being held at the same venue as theirs. They then created a find-a-meeting app. But it displayed events only in the region and worked just on Android devices. The group approached the IEEE Mobile Center of Excellence, which redesigned it with more bells and whistles as well as the ability to search events being held in all IEEE regions.

Other Features: The IEEE Event Finder app makes it easy to add any IEEE event to your mobile calendar. And you can share its URL via social media, email, or text message. The app shows the event’s location on the mobile device’s default map. From the app, you can also connect to the IEEE conference site, IEEE Collabratec, and other IEEE sites.

The Event Finder is the first of several apps in the works by the IEEE Mobile Center of Excellence. More are scheduled to be introduced this year.

title: Event Schedule for Kustom
description:
**THIS IS NOT A STANDALONE APP** You need the Pro version of KLWP or KWGT to use these komponents or widgets. 

You also need a compatible launcher supported by KLWP/KWGT (for example, Nova launcher). 
 

Event Schedule for Kustom includes 8 komponents, each with multiple user options to customize. Settings for width, vertical spacing; separate settings for title/time/date fonts (font/size/color) Event markers color-coordinated with your selected calendar(s); choose your own color; or turn markers off. Easily display between one and twenty events: all-day events only; appointments only; or all events. "Scroll bar" to look ahead 20 events past last displayed, and more. Adjust to suit your layout.. 


ADDING KOMPONENTS TO YOUR KLWP WALLPAPER
- Open KLWP app
- Tap + icon and select Komponent
- Tap the 'Installed' tab
- Select 'Events for Kustom' from the list
- Select the Event komponent you wish to use
- Tap the save icon
- Return to homescreen


ADDING KOMPONENTS TO YOUR KWGT WIDGET
- Long press homescreen and drag a KWGT to it
- Tap on the Widget to open the KWGT app
- Create a new widget, or open a downloaded/exported preset
- Tap + icon and select Komponent
- Tap the 'Installed' tab
- Select 'Events for Kustom' from the list
- Select the Event komponent you wish to use
- Tap the save icon
- Return to homescreen and resize to suit

title: Fever - Discover. Book. Enjoy.
description:
Fever helps you discover what to do in your city, where to go and what to visit. Find exclusive events, secret places, and trendy pop-ups  where you can enjoy new experiences. Our app recognizes your tastes and suggests the best personalised leisure offers.

Available in New York, Los Angeles, London, Manchester, Paris, Lisbon, Madrid, Barcelona, ​​Bilbao, Seville, Valencia, Málaga, Ibiza...

Main benefits and features:

- Personalized recommendations based on your interests.
- Search or filter by topic and you will see nearby experiences  and  upcoming events.
- Save your favorite plans, pay safely in two clicks and get your mobile tickets.

Use the application to book and reserve tickets at the best price for all types of events.

- Food places: restaurants, brunch, gourmet, dining, coffees and food drink fests
- Theater (Broadway), comedy, circus cabaret

comments: Pretty bad that login works only with OAuth from FB or Google. Also, I would add an option to *not* save the credit card details. **edit after answer of the Fever Labs**: I downgraded from 2 stars to 1 star because "Fever Labs" provided a very lame answer to my critiques. This has nothing to do with the app itself, but gave to me the impression (probably I'm wrong, but this is just my opinion) of a team with a narrow vision for their product.

Our experience was terrible, and no fault of the venue. We arrived at the location and were greeted with blank faces due to the fact that they hadn't sold any tickets so had cancelled the event. When I showed the lady my actual ticket she was shocked as they only sold tickets through their own website and another different ticketing agency and had no idea why Fever were sell tickets for them. Worst 'experience' I've ever had with such a service and am still waiting for my money back

I bought tickets for an event that I mistakenly thought was in my neighborhood based on adds that were shown to me on Facebook. I'm assuming the ads were determined as relevant to me because there is a bar with the same name down the street. However the location where the event was, is over an hour away. It was an all you can drink event and there was no way I could safely attend. The refund was denied. It was $120 and there was no way to use the tickets. Bad customer service. Bad policy.

This is stupid, I do not need any app to use once for a ticket, especially when there are general standards for tickets that are useable on all modern phones. A qr code pdf should be available as an alternative. I notice no mention of this nonsense is made before I have paid for ticket.
Been using it for awhile now and so far so good, specially the exclusive events. The discounts are real and there's no fuss! Try it out! Get savings right from your very first purchase! :)

title: eventseeker - events, concerts
description:
Just press play! Now eventseeker helps you discover new music with an instant play button that allows you to hear songs from bands and musicians with upcoming concerts. Sample music with your Spotify Premium account to listen to full songs. 

eventseeker is your personalized event service with a focus on minimizing search and maximizing discovery. We tune into your social channels, as well as your music and device libraries to find your favorite musicians, bands, sports teams and comedians. Next, we create a custom event calendar for you based on your location. Choose to receive push notifications for newly announced shows. Share events, invite friends and purchase tickets to any event within seconds.


* Play music from bands appearing at upcoming shows
* New improved menus and stunning images for easier navigation
* Sync your Spotify, Google Play, Twitter, and Last.fm accounts to view your personalized event calendar 
* Choose to receive push notifications for newly announced events from your favorite artists
* Get recommendations on similar artists and events based on your interests
* Watch videos, read bios and find complete schedules for bands, sports teams, comedians and more
* Share and invite friends via Facebook, Twitter, SMS or email
* Purchase tickets instantly from one of our hundreds of partners
* Discover events in cities worldwide, including Festivals, Theater, Sports, Concerts, Nightlife and more
* Keep updated with artists' Facebook, Twitter and Instagram posts in real time
* Available for use in Ford cars with SYNC Applink
* Compatible with Land Rover and Jaguar vehicles fitted with InControl™

title: Bsociable – Event Scheduler
description:
Discover social events and see what’s happening around you, get event tickets and share the event information further with friends and family instantly, or host your own events -- birthdays, anniversaries, dinners, classes, coffee catch-ups, team meetings, sports events and more -- relevant and right information on your fingertips.
Now you have the choice to run your events based on your lifestyle -- flexible choice of ticketed or non-ticketed entry, public or ‘invitation only’ guest list and instant access to relevant information from your mobile device. As an event organizer you can stay on top of your guest count, and the guests can communicate with ease through the app.
With Bsociable mobile app, you can:
•	Discover social events and see what’s happening around you
•	View the relevant event information, including date, time and location in one place
•	Discover and direct to your destination faster with the integrated maps
•	Get event tickets instantly. Calendar reminders and e-tickets are saved automatically – total piece of mind
•	Host unlimited social events (ticketed or non-ticketed) and send and receive RSVP confirmations instantly
•	Find time with your family and friends for catch-ups during the week or weekends with the assistance of the Group Calendar
•	See the dietary preferences of your guests and cater food to their requirements
•	Easily communicate with your guests and share messages, photos, videos and more
•	Get a reliable picture on the estimated arrival time of your guests
As an event organizer you can:
•	Create free or paid tickets instantly
•	Accept fast and secure payments from ticket sales
•	Scan the tickets for check-ins and give your guests an amazing experience
•	View real time sales and check-ins statistics
Bsociable brings people and communities together through social events. Whether it’s a sports event, a wedding, a concert or a corporate event, Bsociable can be used for any event at any location with ease.
Life’s fun when you surround yourself with people that care – good times and positivity. Connect with real people, effortlessly.
We hope that you enjoy the experience and please send us your feedback via email to info@bsociable.com. Please review our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use on our website or the mobile app.

title: Bizzabo
description:
Bizzabo is the industry’s pioneering event app that is trusted by over 10,000 events worldwide. With Bizzabo, event experiences are more impactful and rewarding.

With the Bizzabo app you can:
Review the event agenda, view session locations or find out anything that you need to know about your event.
See who else is attending your event and view their profiles
Message other attendees with private one-on-one messages
Stay in the know with real-time updates about sessions, speakers and special offers

Share event updates directly to social media

MAKE THE RIGHT DECISIONS
Review the event agenda, find session locations, read up on speaker bios, see who else is attending your event, participate in polls and more—all from the palm of your hand.

MEET THE RIGHT PEOPLE

Before the event starts, see who else is attending, mark leads and set up meetings.

For more information, visit Bizzabo.com.

title: Event Token
description:
*** English version below ***

Die Event Token App ist da!
Das mobile Portemonnaie für all deine lieblings Parties, Openairs, Festivals, Konzerte, uvm!

Mithilfe der Blockchain Technologie ermöglichen wir dir ein unvergleichbares Eventerlebnis! Vergiss lange Warteschlangen an der Bar, beim Ticketing oder bei der Einlasskontrolle.
Unsere Mission ist es, die Event Industrie zu digitalisieren – bist Du auch schon ein Teil davon?

Wusstest Du schon..?
Wir nutzen die Blockchain Technologie um all deine Eventwährungen und Tickets transparent und mit höchster Sicherheit zu speichern. Sei Teil der Krypto-Eventrevolution und profitiere von günstigeren Konditionen und attraktiven Promotionen!

Cash-Less
Lange Schlangen und Portemonnaie zücken war gestern… Gönn dir den Event Token Luxus und profitiere noch heute! Mit unseren proprietären und eventspezifischen Kryptowährungen* ladest Du mit den gängigsten Bezahloptionen deine Tokens auf, und bezahlst in Sekundenschnelle – alles dezentral, sicher und transparent gespeichert in unserer Blockchain.

Promotionen und Gutscheinen
Profitiere von spannenden eventspezifischen Promotionen und Gutscheinen! Alles digital in deinem Event-Wallet gespeichert.

All-In-One
Ein Account für all deine Anliegen am Event! Von Ticketing und Payment hin zu Merchandise, Gutscheinen und Promos! Und ständig kommen neue Funktionen und Features dazu!

Coming Soon:
Pay & Collect Feature

Fehlt dir was oder hast du eine Idee für ein neues Feature was dein Eventerlebnis noch verbessern könnte? Schreibe uns unter support@eventtoken.ch.

*unsere erstellten Event-Kryptowährungen (= Tokens) können nicht öffentlich gekauft, (spekulativ) gehandelt oder anderweitig mit Renditeabsichten veräussert werden.

The Event Token App is here!

The mobile wallet for all your favorite parties, open-airs, festivals, concerts, and much more!

With the Blockchain technology at its core, we want to provide you an incomparable event experience! Forget long queues at the bar, at the ticketing desk or at the access control.
Our mission is to digitize the event industry - are you already a part of it?

Did you know...?
We use the blockchain technology to store all your event currencies and tickets securely and transparently. Be part of the crypto event revolution and benefit from more favorable conditions and attractive promotions!

Cash-Less
Long queues and wallets were yesterday... Treat yourself with the Event Token luxury and benefit today! With our proprietary and event-specific cryptocurrencies* you pre-load your tokens with the most common payment options, and pay in a matter of seconds – all decentralized, secure and transparent.

Promotions and vouchers
Benefit from exciting event-specific promotions and vouchers! Everything digitally stored in your event wallet.

All-In-One
One account for all your concerns at the event! From Ticketing and Payment to Merchandise, Vouchers, and Promos. Of course, we’re aiming to constantly provide you with new functions and features.

Coming Soon:
Pay & Collect Feature

Are you missing something, or do you have an idea for a new feature that could improve your event experience? Write to us at support@eventtoken.ch.

*Our created event cryptocurrencies (= tokens) cannot be bought publicly, traded (speculatively) or otherwise sold with the intention of making a profit.

title: Event Map Wizard
description:
EventMapWizard is based on the premise that YOUR EVENT MAP is an asset! Merchants will pay to be seen on YOUR map by YOUR attendees. We can help you monetize your event map. Our advertising platform provides you a new revenue source while being extremely useful for organizing your event and your attendees.

EventMapWizard is a FREE multi-purpose tool for Tournament Directors, Event Organizers, League Administrators and attendees of events. Field and game schedules, team match ups, scores and more are all in your mobile device. Find events, create events, design and share your venue in minutes, route attendees to your event plus much more.

Do you need to organize fields for league play or an upcoming tourney? Are you hosting a beach event?
A small-sided Soccer Tournament? How many fields can fit in your space? How should they be oriented? Are you planning a 5k run, mud run, color run, charity walk or a marathon? How will you measure and set your route? What about concessions, restrooms, tournament central tents, vendors, parking and practice warm up areas? Do attendees know how to find it? You need this app!

EventWizard is great for many event types, including: Soccer
Small Sided Soccer 3v3, 4v4, 5v5
Beach Soccer
Flag Football
Ultimate
Beach Ultimate
Lacrosse
Beach Volleyball
5k, runs, walks, drives, rides and rallies 
Festivals and concerts
Private gatherings of any kind

EventMapWizard uses GoogleMaps and pre-loaded field sizes so you can layout your venue, save it, and share it with your volunteers and attendees. You can create various layouts and models to help in the decision making process and then choose the best design.

Everyone will be able to see the labeled fields and know where they are in relation to their field LIVE on their mobile device. Your volunteers can then help set up for game day, and know where everything is supposed to be.

Your attendees route to your event is automatically generated. Finding parking and finding their field when they arrive is part of the app.

Attendees can view field scheduling of teams, fields and game times, and live scoring updates.

Local to-the-event merchants on the map- attendees can also know where to find a cup of coffee, eat lunch, have a cold drink or find a hotel.

Tournament Sponsors will get exposure inside the app as well, with a link to their site, tournament specials or giveaways with in app ads and redemption.

Users that are unable to attend the event can use the app to keep up with how the team is doing in the tourney.

This app can help you plan your event, organize your volunteers, gain more sponsors, maximize the attendee experience, earn untapped revenue and truly make your Event awesome!

title: SeatGeek – Tickets to Sports, Concerts, Broadway
description:
SeatGeek is the smart way to buy and resell tickets to thousands of sporting events (NFL, NBA, NHL, MLB, MLS), concerts, festivals, and Broadway/theater shows. Tickets are backed by SeatGeek's 100% buyer guarantee, and resellers may list tickets above or below face value.

FEATURES
◆ Interactive Seating Charts
Explore the best deals mapped on interactive seating charts with panoramic photographs from every section. Know what the view from your seat looks like before you buy tickets. 

◆ Deal Score
Never worry about getting ripped off again, every deal on SeatGeek is color-coded from best to worst based on value. 

◆ Mobile Tickets
Show your e-ticket in the SeatGeek app to gain access to venues, no printer necessary. 

◆ Send Tickets
No more waiting outside the stadium for friends in the rain. Send extra tickets to your friends’ phones in a tap for free or for $$$ (US only).

◆ Sell Your Tickets
Can’t attend tomorrow night’s concert? Sell your tickets on SeatGeek’s Marketplace in one tap. SeatGeek will even recommend the best price to help you quickly sell your tickets. 

◆ Discover Nearby Events
Easily browse tickets for any live event. Search by team, artist, venue, genre, or sport (baseball, basketball, hockey, football, Nascar, etc.) to see upcoming events near you. 

◆ Buy Your Way
Conveniently pay via Google Pay or Credit Card.

◆ The Daily Tap
Enter up to once a day to win free tickets to live events nearby.

summary: Buy and sell tickets to sports, concerts, theater, festivals, and comedy events
recentChanges: Meet our latest feature, The Daily Tap — We're giving away tickets to the hottest events. For free. And every day you tap is another chance to win. Navigate to the Browse tab to enter! You'll also find our completely redesigned in-app experience created to enhance the final hours leading up to your game, concert, or show. For better planning, we now provide precise weather updates, venue bag policies, even directions — all right here in the app.
comments: Prior to the last 2 regulation Portland Timbers matches I had issues with the Seat Geek app. On the 1st occasion, I couldn't access my tickets at all and had to get physical tickets from Customer Service. That meant I missed the 1st 20 minutes of a match. The next time I couldn't send the tickets at all when I wasn't able attend. Again, why should I have to go to customer service to get this fixed? Please fix the app.

They take a service fee to provide ONE service - legit tickets. Imagine getting all excited for a show with your friends, and then getting there and being told your ticket had 'already been scanned' and you cannot enter. On top of that it's taken over a week to get a refund. DO NOT USE. --- I got my refund but +20% didn't even cover the cost of getting to the event not to mention the exteme disappointment of finding out you weren't going to get to see the show.

Why do you need to send an email to verify the payout method and why is this information no where on the app or mobile site? I had to login to the full site on a computer to figure out what the issue was for selling tickets. There should be functionality in the app to upload your government ID or AT LEAST an error message with the appropriate information. You can't even view how much you spent on tickets without using the full site.
Used this app to purchase tix for concerts and sporting events for about 2 years now. Hasn't crashed once, never had any issues with my purchases, very easy to use.
So far it seems like a wonderful app ! And I have seen this company help many people. Not only by providing tickets, but also by being generous with money to people who need/deserve it !

title: EventX - Event, Conference, Attendee App
description:
Download the official conference app for all EventXtra Events, including Corporate Meetings Summit, Association Meetings Summit, Group Business Forum and more. 

With just one app download, you’ll have access to all conference content, with features including: 
Agenda – Access your complete conference schedule, power talks, special sessions, speaker bios, and presentations, videos, photos and more.
Social Networking – Interact with conference faculty, engage with other attendees, exhibitors, and business partners.
Navigate – Find your way around the venues with interactive maps with session and sponsor locations, one-on-one areas, lounges, food stations, and inspiration pavilions. 
Sponsors – Learn more about event sponsors, and get contact information of all major partners.
Personalization – Document your own notes, select personal favorites, and create a custom profile to share with other attendees.
Conference Extras – See a list of award nominees, get daily news and updates along with general venue information.

title: Event-O
description:
Event-O uses the British Orienteering database of events to help you find events that interest you.  Select the clubs and regions you want to see in an easy to view calendar.

The calendar lets you see the type of events occurring on a day by day basis using different colours for each level of event.  Red for local, orange regional, yellow national, green major and blue international.  To avoid clutter, only events from clubs and regions selected as 'favourite' are displayed.  National, major and international events are always shown.  If an event is marked 'favourite' then it is highlighted with a star.

Selecting a particular day will display the events on that day.  Again local and regional events are filtered, with national, major and international events always displayed.  If desired a 'double tap' will temporailly  remove the filter and display all events.

A summary of each event is shown along with the approximate mileage, from the postcode entered on the settings page.  The 5 buttons allow you to: visit the BOF website, view event location map, mark as favourite, add to phone calendar and visit club website.

Red for local, orange regional, yellow national, green major and blue international. To avoid clutter, only events from clubs and regions selected as 'favourite' are displayed. National, major and international events are always shown. If an event is marked 'favourite' then it is highlighted with a star.

Selecting a particular day will display the events on that day. Again local and regional events are filtered, with national, major and international events always displayed. If desired a 'double tap' will temporailly remove the filter and display all events.

A summary of each event is shown along with the approximate mileage, from the postcode entered on the settings page. The 5 buttons allow you to: visit the BOF website, view event location map, mark as favourite, add to phone calendar and visit club website.

Very useful app.

title: Eventendor
description:
Eventendor is India's most loved event planning app, which helps you to plan your event in your way.

Eventendor is all you need when planning for your next event, whether it is your family function or your corporate event. Find vendors for your events, compare their offerings and budget. Discover new event ideas and inspiration, browse through thousands of vendors and book meeting with them at your time. Select your preferred artists, venues, DJs and many more. Use search filters to find what you're looking for and vendor reviews to make informed choices.

Plan following Events with us:
Ring Ceremony
Mahendi Rasam
Sangeet Sandhya
Baraat Procession
Wedding Ceremony
Wedding Anniversary
Baby Shower
Birthday Party
Corporate Parties and Events

Our network:
We are associated with a large number of vendors across all the categories. We can personally provide the discounted price of any of our partners.

Your requirements:
Just tell you what event you want to plan and your budget. Our team will craft multiple vendor options for you and book them for your event.

Our management:
Not only bookings, we also manage your entire event from start to an end in a highly professional manner and affordable rates. "Be guest in your own event!"

Features:

Explore Event Vendors:
Find vendors across 50+ relevant categories like

Various Artists: Mahendi Artists, Makeup Artists, Dance Troops, Magicians, Comedians, Circus Artists.

Decorators: Lighting Decorators, Flower Decorators, Balloon Decorators, Traditional Festival Decorators, Theme Decorators, Overall Decorators.

Anchors: Wedding Anchors, Comedian+Anchors, Corporate Event Anchors, Fashion Shoe Anchors.

Photographers: Wedding Photographers, Pre-wedding Photographers, Fashion Photographers, Corporate Photographers, Maternity Photographers, Concert Photographers & Videographers, Live Video & Cinematographers.

Caterers: Food Caterers, Cake Caterers.

DJs: Corporate DJs, Wedding DJs, Overall DJ Setup.

Musicians: Music Bands, Solo Musicians, Folk Musicians, Instrumental Musicians.

Baraat Procession: Bands, Dholis, Baggis, Kacchi Godis, Wedding Godis, Wedding Elephants, Stand Lights, Fireworks.

Pandit: Wedding Pandits, Astrologers.

Choreographer: Wedding Choreographers, Bride & Groom Entries, Pre-wedding Shoot Choreographers, Fashion Show Choreographers, Other Event's Choreographers. 

Venues: Banquet Halls, Party Plots, Restaurants

descriptionHTML:
Eventendor is India's most loved event planning app, which helps you to plan your event in your way.

Eventendor is all you need when planning for your next event, whether it is your family function or your corporate event. Find vendors for your events, compare their offerings and budget. Discover new event ideas and inspiration, browse through thousands of vendors and book meeting with them at your time. Select your preferred artists, venues, DJs and many more. Use search filters to find what you're looking for and vendor reviews to make informed choices.

Plan following Events with us:
Ring Ceremony
Mahendi Rasam
Sangeet Sandhya
Baraat Procession
Wedding Ceremony
Wedding Anniversary
Baby Shower
Birthday Party
Corporate Parties and Events

Our network:
We are associated with a large number of vendors across all the categories. We can personally provide the discounted price of any of our partners.

Your requirements:
Just tell you what event you want to plan and your budget. Our team will craft multiple vendor options for you and book them for your event.

Our management:
Not only bookings, we also manage your entire event from start to an end in a highly professional manner and affordable rates. "Be guest in your own event!"

Features:



Explore Event Vendors:


Find vendors across 50+ relevant categories like

Various Artists: Mahendi Artists, Makeup Artists, Dance Troops, Magicians, Comedians, Circus Artists.

Decorators: Lighting Decorators, Flower Decorators, Balloon Decorators, Traditional Festival Decorators, Theme Decorators, Overall Decorators.

Anchors: Wedding Anchors, Comedian+Anchors, Corporate Event Anchors, Fashion Shoe Anchors.

Photographers: Wedding Photographers, Pre-wedding Photographers, Fashion Photographers, Corporate Photographers, Maternity Photographers, Concert Photographers & Videographers, Live Video & Cinematographers.

Caterers: Food Caterers, Cake Caterers.

DJs: Corporate DJs, Wedding DJs, Overall DJ Setup.

Musicians: Music Bands, Solo Musicians, Folk Musicians, Instrumental Musicians.

Baraat Procession: Bands, Dholis, Baggis, Kacchi Godis, Wedding Godis, Wedding Elephants, Stand Lights, Fireworks.

Pandit: Wedding Pandits, Astrologers.

Choreographer: Wedding Choreographers, Bride & Groom Entries, Pre-wedding Shoot Choreographers, Fashion Show Choreographers, Other Event's Choreographers.

title: Dance events
description:
The Dance Events app will help you during your event:

• No more paper. The app has a customizable and offline-ready schedule. 
• Stay up-to-date with the event news, updates and activities.
• Leave your feedback, comments, likes, and votes for the organizers.
• Don't get lost outside or inside the venue with map features.

Also it's a great tool for organizers:

• Change schedules or locations on the fly and get everybody informed
• Entertain your participants with media content
• Use stats and analytics to understand your audience 
• Save time and resources on organizational stuff
• Attract more participants improving your event

Contact us to add your event to the Dance Events app!
